Svjedočimo tome da je njihova imena nemoguće pronaći u školskim udžbenicima. Dokazi o njihovom postojanju gube se u savremenoj kulturi, a po njima su rijetko nazvani gradski trgovi, škole ili ulice. Mi želimo ispričati njihove priče, pokazati njihova lica i prisjetiti se njihovih postiguća. Podrškom knjizi #ŽeneBiH doprinosite oživljavanju naslijeđa ovih žena, kao i povećanju njihove vidljivosti.Naš angažman na ovoj knjizi je u potpunosti volonterski, ali za izdavanje ove knjige potrebna su nam finansijska sredstva. Raduje nas što smo već uspjele prikupiti 49% sredstava za knjigu, zahvaljujući ličnim finansijskim investicijama pojedinaca i pojedinki, kao i podrškom sponzora/ica. Ovom kampanjom želimo prikupiti preostalih 51% finansijskih sredstava, kako bismo obezbijedile honorare za ilustratorice, lektoricu i ostale saradnice.Potrudile smo se da ono što nudimo odgovara realnim cijenama, i da svako pronađe ponešto za sebe ili svoje prijatelje/ice, članove/ice porodice i kolege/ice.Želimo izdati najmanje 500 primjeraka ove knjige, stoga jezgru ponude čini upravo knjiga #ŽeneBiH. Naš cilj je da se ova knjiga nađe u vašim domovima i javnim bibliotekama, te da vam približi fascinantne žene zbog kojih smo sve ovo i započele.Što više donirate – mi vas više darujemo, pa tako u u kombinaciji sa knjigom nudimo i naljepnice, bedževe i torbe. Uz to imamo i specijalne ponude u ograničenoj količini – broševe sa minijaturnim portretima deset žena iz knjige, koje je izradila umjetnica Selma Mahmutović, te društvenu igricu Strašne žene. Tu su i posebne prednosti za one koji budu htjeli imati personalizirano izdanje knjige, a tokom kampanje predstavit ćemo i nove ponude.Vjerujemo da ćete nam pomoći da postignemo naš postavljeni cilj i izdamo knjigu #ŽeneBiH.Ovu inicijativu započele smo želeći da napravimo doprinos vidljivosti žena BiH i da ohrabrimo slične edukativne inicijative. Uložile smo svoje vrijeme, trud, talente i emocije. Uspjele smo doći ovako daleko samo zahvaljujući svakodnevnom angažmanu, predanosti i vjeri u ovu ideju. Ispred nas je još mnogo istraživanja i rada kako bismo knjigu finalizirale do planiranog roka.Ova knjiga slavi žene koje su odlučile da se školuju onda kada to ženama nije bilo dozvoljeno, koje su bile (i jesu) ambasadorice bh. umjetnosti i kulture u svijetu; koje su se zalagale za ženska prava u vrijeme kada ona uopće nisu postojala; koje su položile svoje živote za borbu protiv fašizma; koje su postigle svjetske uspjehe u poljima svog djelovanja i koje su bile ili jesu jedno od najvećih blaga koje BiH ima.Podržavajući izdavanje knjige #ŽeneBiH na bilo koji od izabranih načina, pomoći ćete nam da proširimo znanje o ovim ženama, kako bi njihova imena i njihovo naslijeđe postali poznati svima, te ćete doprinijeti očuvanju i oživljavanju ženske historije koja je nepravedno zapostavljena. Konačno, svojim doprinosom realizaciji knjige #ŽeneBiH omogućavate da buduće generacije djevojčica i dječaka budu upoznate sa naslijeđem ovih izuzetnih žena, koje su svojim radom i zalaganjem zadužile sve nas.Od početka smo znale da ćemo se suočiti sa brojnim poteškoćama, jer nismo imale nikakav unaprijed obezbijeđen budžet, niti ikakvu sigurnost da će knjiga koju pravimo ikada ugledati svjetlo dana. Susrele smo se sa raznim pitanjima i komentarima, kojima su ljudi propitivali to da li smo sigurne da mi ovo možemo. Da – sigurne smo da mi ovo možemo, zato što želimo. Bez obzira na ishod kampanje, mi ćemo pronaći način da knjigu objavimo.Uprkos tome što smo u realizaciju projekta uložile vlastito vrijeme, i pored radnih obaveza i ostalih životnih okolnosti, uspjele smo kreirati inicijativu baziranu na solidarnosti i suradnji koja je okupila ljude iz BiH, ali i šire. Ono što nam je pomoglo da istrajemo bila je kontinuirana podrška brojnih ljudi koji su nam se javljali, nudili nam svoju pomoć i motivirali nas da nastavimo.Potrudile smo se da rizike minimiziramo koliko god je moguće, stoga putem ove kampanje prikupljamo pola iznosa potrebnog za izdavanje knjige. Ipak, ne možemo biti potpuno sigurne da će kampanja biti uspješna, ali vjerujemo da možemo računati na vašu podršku koju smo imale i do sada.Razumijemo da nisu svi/e u situaciji da finansijski doprinesu realizaciji ove knjige. #ŽeneBiH možete podržati i na druge načine:
proslijedite ovu kampanju prijateljima/cama i poznanicima/ama putem e-maila;
podijelite kampanju na svojim društvenim mrežama
pratite #ŽeneBiH na društvenim mrežama Facebook Twitter Instagram

 Pomozite nam da ove žene učinimo dijelom historije kojoj one ravnopravno pripadaju!Ukoliko imate pitanja u vezi knjige #ŽeneBiH, kontaktirajte nas na info@zenebih.ba Overview: The book #ŽeneBiH is an artistic, activist and research initiative that is comprised of biographies of over 50 BiH women who have broken stereotypes and advocated women’s rights and emancipation. Each woman was illustrated by a different woman illustrator/designer/artist from BiH. This is a book about first female artists, writers, poets,  social workers, national heroines, directors, scientists, musicians, doctors, activists, professors, deans, pilots and even soccer referees.Greetings to all! We are three friends: Amila Hrustić Batovanja, Hatidža Gušić and Masha Durkalić. We began #ŽeneBiH story spontaneously in March 2018, after a group chat on Facebook. In that moment we were on three different locations in the world (Prague – Sarajevo – Reykjavik) and this group chat was our way of staying in touch.During one of our conversations (it was March 1, 2018), we have discussed the ways #WomensHistoryMonth was being celebrated in terms of gender equality around the world. During this conversation, we have realized that in our home country women’s achievements and their strength are rarely, almost never on the public agenda. We wanted to start changing that for at least a month, and we decided to make our own social media campaign by sharing visuals with photos and biographies of remarkable BiH women, posting a story on a different woman each day, hoping that the stories will reach at least our friends and followers. The following day (March 2, 2018) we have posted our first visual with a short biography and photo of Staka Skenderova, the first teacher and social worker from BiH.For this social media campaign, we have chosen women who were pioneers in their fields, who have advocated emancipation and gender equality, and who were an inspiration to us. Soon after the first visual was posted, people have started sharing it on their own profiles, and suggesting other remarkable women, the media followed, and the story went on beyond our personal social media profiles.The positive reactions on social media were overwhelming, people were supportive and encouraged us to continue with our work. After the last visual was posted we came to realization that one month is not enough to celebrate all the women’s accomplishments and we wanted to continue sharing stories about these and more amazing women.Encouraged by your reactions and suggestions, we have decided to expand this project into a book #ŽeneBiH and this is the reason you are now reading these lines. Our vision is that this book should be a collection of biographies of over 50 women who have broken stereotypes, advocated gender equality and emancipation, and were pioneers in their field of work. We have included 50 female BiH artists, designers and/or illustrators who have made unique portraits of these remarkable women.The book #ŽeneBiH is a combination of our individual professional backgrounds and our friendship. Amila has a master’s degree in product design, and more than seven years of experience as an art director in advertising. Hatidža is an economist and a project manager with a feminist background leading projects on women’s empowerment. Masha is a journalist, researcher and an activist who has been writing and researching in the field of women’s human rights, women empowerment and feminist movements. The bond that binds us is feminism and principles of solidarity and equality we honor and live by.In the time of the conception of this idea we were at three different locations in the world. By balancing our own schedules and responsibilities, we have communicated daily with each other, researched, wrote, drafted and visualized each detail of this book.Women who have changed and shaped the history of BiH are being forgotten. We bear witness to them falling into oblivion and being erased from textbooks. The evidence of their existence is lost in modern culture, and we can rarely see a street, city square or a building named after one of them. We want to tell their stories, show their faces and honor their achievements. By supporting #ŽeneBiH you are contributing to the revival and visibility of their achievements.Our work on this book is entirely voluntary, but we need funds in order to publish the book itself. We are pleased to have already secured 49% of the funds required for the book, thanks to individual personal donations, as well as the support of our sponsors. This campaign aims to collect the remaining 51% of the needed funds, in order to secure the fees for the illustrators, the proofreader, and other associates.We made sure that our perks correspond to actual prices, and that everybody can find something for themselves, or their friends, family, and colleagues.We wish to print at least 500 copies of this book, which means that the core perk is the #ŽeneBiH book itself. Our goal is that this book finds its place in your homes and public libraries, and to help you get to know the remarkable women who inspired us to embark on this journey.The more you donate - the more we give in return, so the perks are a combination of the book and stickers, buttons, or tote bags. We also have a limited special offer - brooches with miniature portraits of ten women featured in the book created by artist Selma Mahmutović, as well as the Fierce Women card game. There are special perks for those of you who would like to own a personalized copy of the book, and we will be introducing even more perks during the campaign.We believe that you will help us achieve our goal and make our dream of publishing this book come true.We started this initiative wishing to contribute to the visibility of women in Bosnia and Herzegovina, and to encourage similar educational initiatives. We have invested our time, effort, talents, and emotions. We have made it this far thanks to everyday engagement, commitment, and our faith in this idea. We still have a lot of research and work ahead of us in order to finalize the book by the set deadline.This book celebrates women who decided to pursue education even when women were not allowed to do so, who were (and are) ambassadors of BiH art and culture in the world, the women who promoted women’s rights at a time when they did not even exist, women who gave their lives in the fight against fascism, women who have achieved worldwide fame in their respective fields of work, and those who were or are one of the greatest treasures of BiH.By supporting the publication of the book #ŽeneBiH in any way, you will help us spread the knowledge about these women, in order to make their names, accomplishments and heritage known to all, and contribute to the preservation and invigoration of the unjustly disregarded female history. Finally, with your contribution to making the book #ŽeneBiH possible, you are making sure that future generations of girls and boys will get to know the names and accomplishments of these extraordinary women, whose work and commitment indebted all of us.Ever since the beginning, we knew that we will face numerous challenges, since we had no previously secured budget, or any certainty that the book we were creating will ever see the light of day. We encountered many inquiries and comments from people questioning whether we were sure we could do this. Yes - we are sure we can do this, because we want to. Regardless of the campaign’s outcome, we will find a way to publish the book.Despite investing our own time in this project, even with our own work and personal commitments, we have succeeded in creating an initiative based on solidarity and cooperation that has brought together people from Bosnia and Herzegovina, and beyond. What kept us going was the continued support of many people who have contacted us, offered to help, and motivated us to carry on.We made sure to minimize the risks as much as possible, so this campaign aims to gather half of the funds required to publish the book. However, we cannot be completely sure that the campaign will be successful, but we are counting on your support that we have had so far.We are aware that not everyone can financially contribute to this project. You can also support #ŽeneBiH in other ways:
email the news about this campaign to your friends and acquaintances
share the campaign on your social media profiles
follow #ŽeneBiH on  Facebook Twitter Instagram

Help us make these women a part of history they rightfully belong to!If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@zenebih.ba

story:
Pregame: Alcohol, Addiction & Recovery Through the Eyes of a College Student. 

A college student's perception of addiction in the United States, through her personal story, the stories of others in recovery, and including policy issues in the U.S. that prevent addressing addiction in a productive manner. 

My name is Maggie King and I am the author of Pregame. I wrote this book because I wanted to write about addiction through the eyes of a college student.
My hope is that, in reading this book, you will gain a deeper understanding of addiction and recovery in the United States. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for advocating for recovery in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you advocate for change in your community and be an ally to those suffering from the disease of addiction.

In this book, you'll learn about addiction and recovery in America, including:
  • My personal story of recovery
  • An account of addiction in the city of Philadelphia
  • Inspiring stories of young people recovering from drugs and alcohol

You will love this book if you or a family member have struggled with addiction or you are interested in social justice in the United States.

Pregame is a non-fiction book that speaks to the recovery community as well as the politicians and lawmakers that have the authority to empower stories of survival, using them to inspire change. 

 

The Book - Pregame

The book is written in 3 Parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction (my personal story of recovery) + additional chapters. It focuses on the city of Philadelphia, the criminal justice system and its need for comprehensive reform.

Part 2 contains Chapters 3-5. This section will focus on Purdue Pharma's influence on the current opioid epidemic, medical challenges induced by alcoholism and addiction, and treatment centers across America.

Part 3 contains Chapters 4-8. The last section of the book focuses on collegiate recovery, demographic shifts in the recovery community and the stories of those who have never had a legal drink, such as myself.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2019

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book

And more...

About the Author

Maggie King is a Sophomore at Wellesley College, originally from Philadelphia. She is a member of the Wellesley Field Hockey team and founder of the first Wellesley Collegiate Recovery Program, which is still in its first stages. She will graduate in 2021 with a bachelor's degree in Political Science. King chose a political science degree for her interest in public policy as a means of national change. 

In December 2017, King got clean and sober from alcohol and marijuana. Nearly a year into recovery has taught her that addiction and recovery are only as strong as the institutions that support or inhibit them. Choosing to write a book about addiction and recovery in the United States was a no brainer. 

King has identified multiple areas of interest in the larger area of addiction: law enforcement, medical services, pharmaceutical companies, the criminal justice system, demographics and recovery programs. Through her interviews and research, King hopes to paint an honest picture of addiction in America. Her goal is to identify what is still holding the recovery community back as well as instill hope in her readers in the solution she and her friends have found in recovery. 

This book is a story of strength as well as a call to action. 

For more information you can connect with Maggie at mking4@wellesley.edu and on Instagram @maggiexking

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #Pregame and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Maggie King

story:
Story of My Book

The Beautiful Math of Coral is a coming-of-age story set in college about STEM, Art, and all the intangible things in between.

My name is E. Ozie and I am the author of The Beautiful Math of Coral. I wrote this book because I wanted to talk about STEM and Art through storytelling. I wanted to write a story about things you don’t usually see in a fictional sense.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the beauty of mathematics, science, and art. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to learn alongside Coral and Fernando about the importance of love, friendship, and what that could mean for STEM and Art.

The Beautiful Math of Coral: A Novel

Coral: She hates art. She hates it so much. Who would have thought in a Nigerian-American household your parents prioritize the arts over the sciences? She just wants to go to college to escape all of that.

Fernando: He used to like astronomy, but now he doesn’t. He liked architecture, but now he doesn’t. He wants to study computer engineering, but should he? He questions what he wants to do in the future and his parents want him to succeed. He has some dreams that he wants to reach no matter how crazy people think he is.

Coral welcomes us into her world full of colors that she wants to leave. She doesn’t want to revisit the past, the past that was art. Fernando had aspirations to be an architect, but that all fell through when he got to college.

Coral is ready to explore everything in STEM but is unaware of everything. Fernando wants to get a degree in engineering but questions his reasons.

Fernando is different from Coral in many ways, but somehow they found each other. Together, they try to find their place in the world and their place in STEM.

This is a powerful story about a young girl grappling with first love, college, engineering, identity, and all the other intangible things in between. It’s about discovering the unfamiliar and looking into the unknown with someone else because those are the moments that surround us and make us who we are.

So, who were you before you saw the beauty in the unfamiliar things? No, who were you really?

You will love this book if you are a fan of Chemistry by Weike Wang orThe Sun is Also a Star by Nicola Yoon. You will also love this if you find science, engineering, mathematics, or art fascinating and want to learn more about them.

The Beautiful Math of Coral speaks to young adults and older who want to grapple with STEM and Art in a new way. I look forward to exploring these themes and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing the unconventional beauty in STEM and Art will help us discover beauty in so many other places.

What We Need & What You Get

 

 

About the Author

E. Ozie is a Nigerian-American college student majoring in Mechanical Engineering. She is a big music lover. When she isn’t being called a workaholic by her friends, she is probably watching a K-drama that came out years ago or dancing to no music. Her passions are painting, laughing, music, and writing. She likes learning new languages and dreaming about traveling the world.

She wrote this book because she likes looking beyond the surface of most things. She is curious about things that people see, but don’t really take an in-depth look at. She wanted to bring fiction storytelling to STEM and Art.

For more information, you can connect with E. Ozie at https://twitter.com/eezowrites or https://www.instagram.com/eezoroyiwrites/?hl=en. Her linktree is https://linktr.ee/E.Ozie.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the delivery serivice we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
E. Ozie

He wants to study computer engineering, but should he? He questions what he wants to do in the future and his parents want him to succeed. He has some dreams that he wants to reach no matter how crazy people think he is.Coral welcomes us into her world full of colors that she wants to leave. She doesn’t want to revisit the past, the past that was art. Fernando had aspirations to be an architect, but that all fell through when he got to college.Coral is ready to explore everything in STEM but is unaware of everything. Fernando wants to get a degree in engineering but questions his reasons.Fernando is different from Coral in many ways, but somehow they found each other. Together, they try to find their place in the world and their place in STEM.This is a powerful story about a young girl grappling with first love, college, engineering, identity, and all the other intangible things in between. It’s about discovering the unfamiliar and looking into the unknown with someone else because those are the moments that surround us and make us who we are.So, who were you before you saw the beauty in the unfamiliar things? No, who were you really?You will love this book if you are a fan of Chemistry by Weike Wang orThe Sun is Also a Star by Nicola Yoon. You will also love this if you find science, engineering, mathematics, or art fascinating and want to learn more about them.The Beautiful Math of Coral speaks to young adults and older who want to grapple with STEM and Art in a new way. I look forward to exploring these themes and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing the unconventional beauty in STEM and Art will help us discover beauty in so many other places.

What We Need & What You Get

 

 


About the Author
E. Ozie is a Nigerian-American college student majoring in Mechanical Engineering. She is a big music lover. When she isn’t being called a workaholic by her friends, she is probably watching a K-drama that came out years ago or dancing to no music. Her passions are painting, laughing, music, and writing. She likes learning new languages and dreaming about traveling the world.She wrote this book because she likes looking beyond the surface of most things. She is curious about things that people see, but don’t really take an in-depth look at. She wanted to bring fiction storytelling to STEM and Art.For more information, you can connect with E. Ozie at https://twitter.com/eezowrites or https://www.instagram.com/eezoroyiwrites/?hl=en. Her linktree is https://linktr.ee/E.Ozie.

Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the delivery serivice we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!Thanks again,E. Ozie

story:
Our Story

We are a collective of cutting-edge Christian thinkers, leaders, ministers, and scholars. Our story began when the COVID-19 pandemic upended everything we knew about church. In the blink of an eye, worship went online. Our faith communities went virtual. And that left churches everywhere wrestling with whether, and how, to offer Eucharist/Communion, one of the core practices of Christian faith.

  • Some churches took a leap of faith and began offering Eucharist online.
     
  • Other traditions chose to suspend the Eucharist, trusting that the Spirit would nourish her people in other ways.
     
  • Others have inhabited a space of uncertainty and wrestling.
     
  • Still others modeled what it looks like to faithfully and responsively change course as the pandemic spanned not weeks, but months and counting.

 

Rooted in each of our traditions, we have come together to ask hard questions and cast a vision for what it means to be faithful here and now to Christ's command, "Do this in remembrance of me." We desire to offer this ecumenical anthology as a gift to the church, and we can't do it without your support.

 

What We Need

With the funds raised by this campaign, the Transforming Eucharist project will:

  • Publish both physical books and a user-friendly Amazon Kindle edition with Outskirts Press, an independent publishing company.
     
  • Distribute through author events, Amazon, Barnes & Noble, Ingram, Baker & Taylor, and more.
     
  • Provide pastors, scholars, and church leaders with much-needed, relevant thinking on this challenging and crucial topic in the life of the church.
     
  • For full publishing information, click here.
     
  • Funds beyond our $3,200 goal will support marketing for this project, enabling greater reach and wider access.

 

What You Get

We'd love to show our gratitude for your support with the perk of your choice! See available perks at right.

 

The Impact

The COVID-19 pandemic marks a moment of reformation. As a gift to the church, this ecumenical anthology:

  • Casts a vision for the future of Eucharist/communion that is both deeply rooted in tradition and responsive to the needs of the present moment. 
     
  • Offers practical suggestions for clergy and church leaders seeking to offer the sacrament in new ways, historical ways, and virtual ways.
     
  • Speaks from and to many traditions and denominations, recognizing that we are in this together.

 

Support a Good Cause

Any proceeds from Transforming Eucharist online sales, after print costs have been paid, will be donated to Mercy Community Church, a ministry that has been safely feeding hungry bodies and souls on the streets of Atlanta throughout the COVID-19 pandemic.

To catch a glimpse of their profoundly embodied ministry in this season, visit their Instagram. 

 

What If?

The biggest question every good backer should be asking: What if we don't meet our goal? 

  • While the publishing package we have chosen is a modest one, Outskirts Press offers bare bones publishing options beginning at $999. Should we fall short of our $3,200 goal, we intend to pursue this option.
     
  • Should we raise less than $999, we are prepared-- as the pandemic has taught us all to do-- to pivot and pursue more cost-effective options.
     

All this said, we are confident that our hybrid (digital + print) publishing approach will best meet the needs of clergy and church leaders, and we're excited to meet them where they are with your support.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Love our project but unable to contribute financially?

  • Share our campaign with your professional and social media networks.
  • Drop us a line at transformingeucharist@gmail.com.
  • Consider lifting this project in your personal devotional practice

 

We are so grateful for your support, however you are able to offer it.

story:
Story of My Book

Mala & the Mask of Gold is a story about two siblings who embark on a quest to find the elusive Mask of Gold and explore Philippine mythology and folklore along the way.

My name is Jaime Martin Ko and I am the author of Mala & the Mask of Gold. I wrote this story because of the diversity gap in U.S. literature that lacks fictional stories of LGBTQ+ and Filipinx identity. Reading queer literature and stories from authors like James Baldwin, Leslie Feinberg, and Audre Lorde helped me to learn about gender identity and sexual orientation today. Books like Rick Riordan’s Percy Jackson series also gave me the power of accepting my flaws as gifts. I knew I wanted to tell a story like these powerful authors who made a huge impact in my life and personal development. My culture and identity is my power and I wanted to add a fantasy and Filipinx touch to create a positive impact on folks who read my book.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that you can be a hero of your own story, if you choose to be. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to engage with LGBTQ+ themes, escape from mundane realities of life into a world of Filipinx folklore, learn alongside Salem and Mala about the importance of sibling-hood and finding power from within. I also want to encourage you, the reader, to become the author of your own story one day — a story that I would love to be a fan of too!

Magic exists in this story of fiction. We explore the rich past of the pre-colonial Philippines before it was even known as such. In this story, we know it as the Old World. The Old World begins with the creation of the early archipelago and the birth of a diverse group of cultures that was home to numerous kingdoms, sultanates, and tribes. The cultures in this world were The Old Tagalogs, The Old Visayans, and The Old Bikolanos, just to name a few. The different cultures worshiped the Ancient Deities, and with the help of spirit friends — abyans, they called them — Babaylans (shamans) worked with the spirit world to bring peace and healing to the communities and their respective people.

Shamans played an important role in the community and materialized in many different forms across the islands. Each Babaylan’s source of magic was unique to themselves and dependent on their inherent talent, their region, the needs from community, and their relationship with specific abyans. From the art of healing through mixing potions and natural herbs to having the rare abilities of sorcery, Shamans evoked the old Philippine mythos and strongly tied the physical and spiritual realm.

The conquest of the islands by the hands of the Blood Moon Empire did not begin until several centuries later with the birth of the first Lunar Eclipse as the catalyst for the invasions. With each Lunar Eclipse Invasion becoming more devastating than the last, the Blood Moon has become an omen of doom for the Old World’s inhabitants. As the indigenous kingdoms fight against the Blood Moon Warriors to expand and empower their people, all hope remains lost. And without hope and belief, the power of the ancient Deities grow weaker with each passing Lunar Eclipse. The destined champions of the Deities must find these sacred artifacts to help restore the hope of the people and balance of the world.

Our story begins with Mala and Salem, two siblings who are products of the Old World and the Blood Moon Empire. The heroes begin this journey to find a sacred artifact known as the Mask of Gold. The two endure a quest of hope — the hope for a new life, the hope to love oneself and their differences, and the hope to restore the Old World to its beauty and power — or rather, create a better world born from the ambiguity of the adventure.

You will love this book...
  • if you are into fantasy-adventure reads.
  • if you’re a teenager or young adult. The main characters are in their adolescent years — Mala is 16 and Salem is 18.
  • if you’re a fan of stories like Castlevania, Atlantis: The Lost Empire, the Percy Jackson Series, or The Poppy War.
Mala & the Mask of Gold speaks to young adults and those in the LGBTQ+ community who want to grapple with identity and culture in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Mala & the Mask of Gold inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:
  • How can our own differences and insecurities be our powerful advantages?
  • Why are siblinghood and family both powerful yet frightening?
  • Why are magic and culture intertwined in reality and in fantasy?
I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. Coming together and discussing LGBTQ+ themes in mythology, Siblinghood and Family, and Coming of Age and Sense of Self will change us all for the better.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020.

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hard cover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish an audiobook. I plan to donate 20% of my sales to 2 non profits (10% for each one)


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of my Book and some additional sections of my manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

 

About the Author

Jaime Martin Ko is a Filipinx immigrant, first-generation, and genderfluid college graduate from the University of Maryland where they studied Supply Chain Management, Marketing, and LGBT Studies. Jaime is a vocal advocate for the LGBTQ+ community and was awarded the Lorde-O'Leary award for their work at their university, tackling initiatives like implementing All-Gender restrooms, advocating for inclusive healthcare practices for Trans/Non-binary students, and speaking at panels educating students on LGBTQ+ terminology and issues. Outside of work, Jaime is a part of a variety of organizations like Anakbayan DC.

They wrote this book because it is important to them to show others the beauty of this world. They want to also have fun with the magic and the myths/folklore of the Philippines. As a Filipinx immigrant, Jaime grew up surrounded by influences from different faiths/cultures but never an integration of those stories being told from their homeland. Jaime wants to change that for other Filipinx youth!

They wanted to use this book as a platform for their creativity. Jaime knew that they would regret it in 10 years if they didn’t try to at least own their story and create this adventure that could benefit a lot of people within many different communities and those who are struggling with celebrating their differences.

Outside of this book, they are just Jaime. An immigrant from Zamboanga City, PH who loves makeup, fashion/styling, and advocating for minority communities.

For more information you can connect with Jaime at Jaime91697@gmail.com and @JaimeKoAuthor on Facebook and Instagram.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and that is okay! Here are some other ways to help if you can:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #MagicExistsInMe and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much in advance for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Jaime Martin Ko

story:
I published my first book ICECREAMDUMPTRUCK in 2012, and my second book FUTUREWAYSOFROBOTHEARTS in December of 2014. I now have everything put together and ready for print on a new book that will combine the best of the first two books, and include all new stories and poems, finally in the full and complete vision I want published. I'm raising money to hire a professional editor and publish the book in various formats, including an Exclusive and Limited Hardcover version.

THE BOOK

SEEKERSOFTHELIGHT is a collection of poetry spanning a wide range of topics from the day my Father left home over burnt pot-roast, to the day I watched 9/11 unfold on TV with an Army Recruiter having shown up at my door 15-minutes earlier. It's an experience of life, struggles and pain, promise and joy, all parts...leaving you some nights discouraged, others hopeful, and finding all the way, even in your darkest times, to remember to seek out the light.

LENGTH AND EXCERPTS

The current version of the book is 184 pages. 

FUNDING BREAKDOWN

Having people like you back the project is incredibly important: it helps make the book better, helps retain my true vision, and it helps get the book into the hands of readers. Your support is crucial to making SEEKERSOFTHELIGHT happen.

Your backing will help with the cost of:

  • hiring of an editor
  • proofreading
  • purchase of design materials (fonts, etc.)
  • obtaining ISBN numbers, paying registration fees, and additional costs associated with getting listed in various online bookstores
  • envelopes, packing materials, postage
  • bulk-printing which will reduce the cost per copy
  • marketing

In addition I'll be giving exclusive access to the entire process via backer-only updates.

WHY SEEKERSOFTHELIGHT

I'm a fan of holding books in my hands. Perhaps it's just that haptic quality of physically holding something, or the desire to create and share the end result in physical form. I love sharing books that way. I've bought digitally as well, and this is no knock to that, but being someone who has always scoured bookstores for hours on end, my love will always be that feeling of getting a new book. I've put a lot of time and passion into this, to create something unique to myself, to engage an audience, and to share this work. I want to share it in the highest quality. Publishing this hardcover is the way I can do that, having control over the design process and maintaining that vision.

I feel sharing is an important part of the arts, the collaboration and support of many to see a vision through to the end. I want to see this through to the end, and I want to share that with you.

Risks & Challenges

I think there are many challenges when it comes to creating art on a truly independent level. The real risk with this particular project, is that it needs to be funded in order to reach the right readers and come to completion the right way. I feel confident everything will go as planned, the challenge is to spread the word and make this campaign a success!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, no worries, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • You can help spread the word about the campaign! Sharing is caring!
  • You can use all of the Indiegogo share tools!

proofreading
purchase of design materials (fonts, etc.)
obtaining ISBN numbers, paying registration fees, and additional costs associated with getting listed in various online bookstores
envelopes, packing materials, postage
bulk-printing which will reduce the cost per copy
marketing
In addition I'll be giving exclusive access to the entire process via backer-only updates.WHY SEEKERSOFTHELIGHTI'm a fan of holding books in my hands. Perhaps it's just that haptic quality of physically holding something, or the desire to create and share the end result in physical form. I love sharing books that way. I've bought digitally as well, and this is no knock to that, but being someone who has always scoured bookstores for hours on end, my love will always be that feeling of getting a new book. I've put a lot of time and passion into this, to create something unique to myself, to engage an audience, and to share this work. I want to share it in the highest quality. Publishing this hardcover is the way I can do that, having control over the design process and maintaining that vision.I feel sharing is an important part of the arts, the collaboration and support of many to see a vision through to the end. I want to see this through to the end, and I want to share that with you.
Risks & Challenges  I think there are many challenges when it comes to creating art on a truly independent level. The real risk with this particular project, is that it needs to be funded in order to reach the right readers and come to completion the right way. I feel confident everything will go as planned, the challenge is to spread the word and make this campaign a success!
 
   Other Ways You Can Help If you can't contribute, no worries, that doesn't mean you can't help:  You can help spread the word about the campaign! Sharing is caring! You can use all of the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
The Jig Is Up

We are The Regulators and we are here to change culture through literature, music and film:

  • James Carr, former producer at FOX Sports, editor at The Shadow League and Account Executive/Columnist at Appen Media, spent 14 months interviewing farmers, chefs, professors, scientists, journalists, politicians and entrepreneurs within 100 miles of his location in Atlanta about the local food movement, sustainability and what a world in which communities provided their own food and energy might look like in the digital era. In short, the social structure would be vastly different, meeting the needs of the people on the ground level.
  • Our current system of food creates vast wealth inequality, hurts the environment, sucks money out of communities and weakens our overall health. The people have the power to change this dynamic. This message is one way how, and will hopefully inspire others to see things differently.
  • Your contributions will help change the world. In fact, it has already changed--we simply hope to enlighten the people and begin living in the reality at our fingertips instead of the illusion presented to us by the government, big corporations and mainstream media to hold us back. 

What We Need & What You Get

Since July 2013, we have been researching, writing, recording, filming and editing in order to produce a book, album and a documentary about the underground, sustainable revolution. We hope this work inspires a local movement as well as similar work about the potential for metropolises  around the world.

  • The book is in the final stages and will be released in September. From there we simply need your money to print it, and need additional funding to print the expanded version with photos and bonus content. The expanded version should be ready by November.
  • We have been able to record about a quarter of the music we have planned but need additional funding for more studio time. Artists came together from New Orleans, Miami, Atlanta, New York, Houston, Alpharetta and Stamford, putting their own projects aside to help the cause. Thus far, this includes Lazare St. James, Jae Five and G2 Futuristic from LMBYG, Just Original and Wees Beats, A.J. McNaughton, Zoe Norvell and Devin Miller. Editors include Aldo Nahed, Lisa Ethridge, Zach Dillard, Ray Appen, and several other journalists, writers, businessmen and creatives who provided assistance and advice.
  • Any other funding will go towards marketing and promotion. We hope to tour colleges across the United States, speak at events or festivals and eventually screen our documentary at a few farms to spread the word. To get any of these off the ground we are looking to hire a PR firm to help with coordination but need funding to see them through. After speaking with a few firms we need around $4,000 to accomplish our promotional goals.
  • We hope this will give us enough money to keep the documentary filming afloat for now. Most of it has been filmed but we will continue making progress as the year goes on. In the documentary, you will meet many of the faces behind the movement and find out what inspires them. This will not be ready until at least the winter of 2014.

The Impact

We believe this movement will take power away from big corporations and big government, bringing it back to the people:

  • People will start to see space differently, looking at ways to improve their communities and the lives of those around them.
  • We will live healthier, happier lives and be in more control of our time as well as our political system.
  • No longer will we depend upon big corporations or big government--entities with a proven track record of not caring about the people over the last 40 years--for our basic necessities, seizing back our society and shaping it in our image.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    No money? We totally feel you. Here's how you can help:

    • LIKE and SHARE this campaign on your social media accounts.
    • Email anyone who may be interested in this project a note about our campaign.
    • Stop shopping at big box grocery stores. 
    • And remember, tell the world The Jig Is Up.

    Links:

    Here is a preview of what the t-shirts will look like: http://thejigisup89.tumblr.com/post/93054273728...

story:
Thank you for taking the time to check out my campaign! Please watch the video above for all the info you need to know about my project. For additional details, see below.


***************

The Plan:

*I am self-publishing a book called "Letters To My Papa."

*It's a personal story with a universal concept:  journeying through seasons of life where hope, grief, and love are all tangled together.

*My goal is to share this story with others who have walked through these same seasons, and offer them compassion, hope, and healing with my words. 

*I plan to fund this project by January and go to print in June, with an official release date in mid-August.

***************

What is the book about?

"Letters To My Papa" is a personal story comprising daily letters from a daughter to her father, ensuring that despite sustaining a major brain injury, he'd never miss a day. I'd account for it all and tell him his own unbelievable tale.


The book begins as I tell my father how he just cheated death. With my "Papa Bear" in a coma, I wrote to him when I couldn’t talk to him. I kept the faith that one day he’d wake up and be able to read my words. He did awake, and the words kept coming. So I wrote to him all through his recovery, encouraging his progress, cheering him on, and keeping tabs on the little day-to-day things that his slowly recovering short-term memory struggled to keep up with.


When his recovery took a sudden downturn, I wrote some more, holding out hope for a miracle that never came. With a broken heart surprisingly filled with gratitude, I continued writing through my grief. Those letters provide an intimate account of the grieving process one day at a time.


I invite you to read along as I journey through seasons of hope, joy, fear, sorrow, and most of all, love.


Who is the book for?

For the past 2 years, this has been MY story - one that I've shared with my family, my friends, and my colleagues - but maybe it's YOUR story too!

There may be perfect strangers out there who need to read it. Perfect strangers who will find the slightest comfort in knowing they're not alone. Perfect strangers who will find the simplest inspiration in my journey. This book is for them too.

*Have you ever lost someone close to you, and struggled to find the purpose in each day that followed?
*Have you ever had your whole life turn on a dime and instantly rearrange your priorities?
*Have you ever had to claw your way out of the brokenness around you to rebuild your life?

THIS BOOK IS FOR YOU.

*Have you ever found the silver lining in the darkest of days?
*Have you ever looked back at the wreckage with gratitude for making you stronger?
*Have you ever been beautifully humbled by the outpouring of love from your family, friends, community, and even strangers?

THIS BOOK IS FOR YOU.


Where does the money go?

My funding goal of $7,500 will go toward the following:

  • Editorial fees
  • Legal fees
  • Copyright registration
  • Designing & Branding
  • Formatting
  • Set-up costs for printing
  • eBook conversion
  • Paperback printing
  • Taxes & Shipping
  • Campaign fees

Any additional funds raised beyond the $7,500 goal will be used toward marketing and promotion.


Risks & Challenges

The biggest obstacle on my way to publishing is time. I have tried to estimate a reasonable deadline, aiming to place my print order in June 2015 and deliver perks to my backers by the end of the summer. However, in the event that I am unable to complete this project in that time frame, my backers will be the first to know. I will notify you in advance if I think I need some extra time. Throughout the 6 months that follow my campaign, I am committed to sending you updates on my progress so you'll know how everything is coming together each step of the way.


How Can You Help?

If you've chosen to contribute monetarily, thank you so much for spending your hard-earned money investing in my book! I promise I won't let you down.

If you're unable to contribute financially, but would still like to support "Letters To My Papa," you can help by spreading the word! Share my IndieGoGo campaign link with friends:

  • Drop it in an email
  • Post it to your Facebook page
  • Tweet about it to your followers

You can also stay up to date with my progress via social media:

  • Like the official "Letters To My Papa" Facebook page
  • Follow @LettersToMyPapa on Twitter

***************

Thanks again for taking the time to learn about my project!
Please check back often for updates...

story:
Please go to the following sites:

http://www.endtimeschosen - Website with three free chapters and lots of neat information about the novel.

http://facebook.com/rico.parra1 - facebook site

http://endtimeschosen.wordpress.com - blog site

http://twitter.com/RicoLeeParra - twitter site

WHO IS RICO PARRA?

I am a writer and executive producer.  I am the writer and creator of THE END TIMES PROJECT, which is a series of three epic novels and feature films.  I have self-published the first novel THE END TIMES (The Chosen) with XLIBRIS Publishing.  I am retired and have been working on side jobs to fund my marketing plan.  I now have Indiegogo and gogorocket as partners to help reach supporters like you to raise the funds to implement my marketing plan.  I have previously written business plans as an operations manager for various companies including my own.  I hope to produce a feature film of each of the novels.  I have also finished the script and business plan for the first film.

DESCRIPTION

The “END TIMES (The Chosen)” is a fiction novel about how mankind might be deceived during the End Times as revealed in Revelations.  “EVEN THE VERY ELECT WILL BE DECEIVED.”  How could that possibly happen?”   Read this book and find out.  This novel will take you through a journey that will delight and thrill you with a story of romance, adventure, humor, drama and spiritual insight.  The book also includes a Bibliography with 64 pages of research about angels, prophecy and science.

SYNOPSIS OF NOVEL

This novel is an adventure about a possible scenario of the End Times.  The main character, John Marin, is a genetic scientist with the goal of discovering the true origins of mankind by decoding the DNA genomes.  A new development of energy readings by a machine recently invented gives him a new set of codes to read.  His previous military service was breaking codes in the cryptography section of the US Navy.  His discoveries could lead to discrediting religion and open the doors to the Anti-Christ to create a single world religion and government.  John's research eventually leads to involvement with two groups of people who are preparing for the Anti-Christ.  John first finds himself involved a group of scientists who become good friends, in particular, Janice who he falls in love with and Pepe, whose fate will be coupled with his own.  The lab is funded by a secret organization that is convinced that Satan is a god just as powerful as the real God.  They intend to use science to discredit religion and create a New World order.  At first, John and some of his fellow scientists, including Pepe and Janice, are not aware that the research is not for scientific reasons.  As events unfold, John and Janice realizes the evil intent and eventually leaves the group and joins a small group of spiritual zealots led by an angel named Paint.  Their reclusive hideout in Europe gives them a sanctuary to prepare for the fight against the Anti-Christ.  Meantime, world events are unfolding to reveal catastrophes prophesied in the bible.  John and others becomes involved to the point that they becomes  major characters in the history of mankind.  They train to fight spiritual warfare unlike anything ever experienced or seen in history.  Though the book is fiction, it provides a scenario that might portrait the events that are suppose to occur in the End Times according to the biblical scriptures.

MISSION/VISION

My mission is to take my novel to a NUMBER ONE BEST SELLER.  Millions of book readers will be reached with advertising in newspapers, television, internet, talk radio, and other venues.

MARKETING

Fifteen thousand dollars might seem like a lot for a marketing campaign.  My business plan requires promotions that requires investments in advertising to reach millions of book readers.  Book Daily is just one of many venues that I will utilize to reach my audience.  These promotions and advertising can add up.  Book Daily alone cost me $60 to reach 50,000 readers.  An ad in the New York Times Sunday review will cost me several thousand dollars.  I also need a professional editing that will cost several thousand dollars.  $5,000 will be used to pay for perks for contributors.  See marketing campaign below.

There are many sites that I am promoting my novel that have no cost.  Sites such as as SHOUTLIFE, LIFESPACE, NETBELIEVERS AND HOLYPAL are just a few of the sites that will be promoting my novel.


BUSINESS PLAN MARKETING CAMPAIGN

 ($10,000 for marketing and $5,000 for perks to contributors)

PRIOR TO LAUNCHING MAJOR CAMPAIGN, I WILL HIRE A PROFESSIONAL EDITOR FOR A SECOND EDITION. - ($2000)

START UP (LAUNCHING NOVEL) - ($2000)

Internet Includes - Social Media Marketing Set Up EMC Single 1M Book Trailer without Voice over Optimized Newswire Online Book Search and Online Banner Campaign

Email Marketing Campaign Single 1M - Broadcast information about my book to millions of reading enthusiasts and book lovers.  The Opt-In Email Marketing Campaign is designed to allow me to reach out quickly and inexpensively to truly huge markets — hundreds of thousands or even millions of people. By increasing my book’s exposure to subscribed book lovers and reading enthusiasts across the world, I can vastly increase book sales and awareness about my novel.  I can have my own personalized campaign, and even select highly specific target audiences like fiction readers and religious groups who can relate to the genre of my book.   

Social Media Marketing Set Up - Broadly used, social networking communities are defined as a web of inter-connected people who can directly or indirectly interact with others through profiles, journals, images, videos, and audio. This will increase recognition of my book in major online communities and establish a network of followers, potential readers, fellow authors, industry associates and peers with my social media profiles.  Millions of online users access their own social media profile on a regular basis and actively look to share with others their common interests. Through the profiles and memberships, I can connect, interact, and share with my audience news and information regarding myself and my book.  This service includes the most popular social networks to share my profile and interests, communities specifically for books and authors, the ability to share online journals with multimedia content, and services that help distribute my journal updates to all my existing accounts.  These websites are -  WordPress: A popular and user friendly blogging or online journal site, Facebook: A social networking, messaging, file sharing community, MySpace: A social networking site, Twitter: A social networking and micro blogging service using instant messaging, SMS or a web interface, Twitter Feed which offers to tweet the last posts published in a blog via the RSS feed, Flickr: A photo sharing community with chats, groups and photo ratings, Shelfari: A site where members can build virtual bookshelves, discover, rate and discuss books, and participate in online groups, Goodreads: A community of book lovers who share book recommendations, new reads, form book clubs, create book trivia to name a few, and LibraryThing: A book-cataloging site.

 Book Trailer without Voice Over - Capture my market’s interest and make them crave for more. My words will come alive through motion graphics in this 60-90 second trailer specially created for my book.   The competitive world of book publishing calls for a creative and entertaining way of catching buyer’s attention. Professionally crafted visuals have been proven to not only be entertaining and captivating, but also leaves a lasting mark in the viewer’s mind.   With a Trailer Marketing Service, I'll get my audience to remember my book from among a horde of other titles and potentially pique enough interest to make them grab a copy.  Inclusive of - A 60-90 second custom made book trailer in flash format, Distribution of my finished and approved trailer to video sites like YouTube, Metacafe, DailyMotion and Blip.tv, Placement of my trailer’s link in the About the Book section of my book details page in the Xlibris Bookstore, and Web streaming capability, high-quality video downloads, and an iPod compatible format.

Optimized Newswire - I will partner up with a leading global press release newswire company to distribute my press release to major search engines like Google, Yahoo! News, and Bing. It will be sent to 30,000+ journalists and bloggers and delivered to 250,000+ newswire opt-in news subscribers. Additionally, my press release will be hosted on the newswire website, which receives 1.5 million visitors each month.  This means that my press release can still be read long after the initial distribution date — anybody in the world can now go online and find a press release about the publication of my book. Thousands of businesses and organizations use newswires to alert the world’s media about their latest news every day. All parties can receive a complimentary review copy should they express interest in my book.

Online Book Search and Online Banner Campaign - The Online Banner Campaign enables me to very specifically target blogs with content related to my book and post my ad in front of an audience of loyal and avid blog readers who are interested in the topic(s) covered on the blog.   My ad will run for a period of one week and will include a link back to my website where interested readers can purchase a copy of my book.

 PHASE 2 - Newspaper and Magazine Marketing ($4000)

 The New York Times Sunday Book Review - is the weekly paper-magazine supplement to the New York Times, and is considered the nation’s most credible review of good literature. The NYT Sunday Book Review, which houses the widely cited and influential New York Times Bestseller List, has been shaping reading and purchasing lists for generations.  This insert appears in the Sunday edition of the New York Times. This will get my book in front of those that matter – book buyers, reviewers, and traditional publishers.   Ø  Largest Sunday newspaper in the U.S. with over 375,000 copies.

 Reader's Digest Magazine UK Edition - Reader's Digest is a global media and direct marketing company that connects more than 130 million consumers around the world with products and services from trusted brands. The Reader's Digest Association, Inc. is a worldwide publisher and distributor of magazines, books, recorded music, and home video packages, which are sold through a variety of distribution channels, including direct mail, display marketing, direct response television, catalogs, retail, and the Internet.  Its major publication is the monthly general-interest magazine Reader's Digest, which is the worlds most widely read magazine with a global readership of more than 100 million, and is available in 48 editions and 19 languages. - Founded in 1922 and based in Chappaqua, New York, Reader’s Digest has global circulation of 17 million making it the world’s largest paid circulation magazine distributed in 70 countries with 50 editions in 21 languages. The first international edition was published in the United Kingdom back in 1938.  After publishing in the UK for 72 years, the UK business employs 100 people and is one of the UK’s leading marketers of magazines, books, music, video, financial services and healthcare products.

PHASE 3 - TV Infomercial Focus ($2000)

Infomercial - Author Video: I will create a 60- to 90-second author interview video to advertise my book, including -  Distribution of my book trailer to well-known sites such as YouTube, Metacafe, Dailymotion and Blip.tv., Infomercial Spot: My title, book cover and Author Video will be one of 10 titles featured in a 30-minute infomercial, Wide U.S. Distribution totaling 1 Million Views: Over a six-week period, my infomercial will air 30 times during a mix of overnight, early morning and weekend time spots. It will air on local network affiliates and independent stations, reaching at least 1 million views2 across five geographically diverse cities: Indianapolis, Indiana; Charlotte, North Carolina; Denver, Colorado; San Antonio, Texas; and Fort Myers/Naples, Florida, Report of Air Time: After my campaign is complete, I will receive a report on where my infomercial aired and at what time, DVD of my Infomercial: I will receive a DVD of the final cut for me to use on my future marketing pushes, such as to post on my website, social media sites, or play at my next speaking engagement or book signing, Sales Opportunity: Viewers can call a toll-free number to order my book and save 15% during the infomercial airtime.

THANK YOU FOR PARTICIPATING WITH ME IN MY END TIMES PROJECT.  THIS NOVEL WILL HELP ME IN GETTING THE FEATURE FILM FUNDED IF I TAKE THE NOVEL TO A NUMBER ONE BEST SELLER.  TOGETHER, WE WILL MAKE THIS PROJECT A SUCCESS.

story:
中文点击这里. Click here for Chinese.

People are strange. Kids are stranger.

Hi, I’m josh. I am a teacher and photographer (jbeardfoto.com) living in Beijing, China. My work has been published in both America and Asia, and I have taught creativity training courses to all ages from toddlers to adult professionals. I'm also a kung-fu master at Mario Kart. 


That's me on my creative thinking chair. ;~).


I run a blog called Strange Tiny People, which is all about how kids are pretty punk rock, and deserve a lot more respect than we often give them. If you think kids stuff is, well, kids stuff, then maybe there’s a problem with what we’re giving them. They deserve a better quality of education that, rather than assuming we know what they need, helps them to control the storm of ideas and creation already going on inside of them. 

Bella here finds your patty-cake to be severely lacking in power-chords.

That's why I have started the Strange Tiny People project, where I’ll be traveling to places all over Asia, helping train underprivileged children in creativity and story telling. These children are then going to use their stories to help me create a book, filled with their ideas, and their stories. Their stories will be accompanied by photographic illustrations, that I’ll shoot using the children themselves as the subjects. The kids will keep full copyright and credit of their creations. This is their first published gig, and hopefully the first of many in the future! 


Some Stories are short and happy, like this: 


Some have a powerful geo-political message, like this:


And some are outright frightening, like this:


(STP promotes creativity in all forms, and sees censorship as creativity asphyxiation.)


Why Asia?

In truth, this project is meant for everyone, of every culture, economic class, and cookie preference. Asia is simply the most available to me at this moment.

From my years in the Chinese education system, I have seen that, unfortunately, Asian education often omits creativity and exploration learning in lieu of producing higher test scores and uniformity. While there is definitely a place for tradition and cohesiveness in culture, education that neglects personal identity in order to conform to rigid standards often leads to people who tend to follow orders instead of finding ways to produce results. I want to show that, through creative thinking, followers become leaders and produce much more for their society. 

Strange Tiny People is meant to be accessible to all children, and I very much intend to eventually visit as many possible locations and spread as much awesome as my feet will carry me. 

This is just the first leg on this journey, kiddos.


So, You're Helping Poor Kids To Become Starving Artists?...

Creativity isn't just about artistic ability. People with a conditioned creative mind are able to realize different ways of solving problems, socialize and empathize with others, and are more open to very often unnoticed opportunities. 

From inventing the next cool gadget, to becoming an awesome painter, running for political office, or just making the best fried rice in town, creativity is often what separates being merely proficient in a skill and being a friggin Jedi Master at it.  

You can't instruct creativity from a text book. It's a skill, and thus requires exercise to perform well, just like any muscle in an athlete's body. Once properly trained and conditioned, creativity becomes natural, and finds it's way into every thought, idea, and decision. You know those guys that seem like they just have it together, and make things seem easy where you're always struggling? Jobs, Picasso, Curie, Waits, Page, Tessla, Chopin, Spike. Those are the guys who have put in the time training their brains to work creatively. 

Now imagine these guys have had this training instilled since they were children. That's the kind of people I know I want for the next generation. 


Where is your dough going?   

Does a $6k goal seem really low for a project involving almost a year of travel?? Like, really really low??  Like, that’s less than what McDonald’s pays their part time cashiers for a year???

That’s because it is. 

For the past year, I have been saving my own personal money, taking extra jobs and dancing around on fire (no, really), and eating like a freshman college student (noodles, Asia, yeah). This venture will be funded with my money equally along with yours. 

You didn’t think I would just throw all that burden on your shoulders, did you? 

As a professional photographer, I have most of the equipment needed for high-end portraiture like this, however there are some specific travel-friendly equipment that is needed to do a project where there is a lot of location changing, especially when it’s all carried on my back! :*( . This equipment also needs to be insured. 

Transportation is the largest cost, but I'm keeping it down by only using non-flight transportation. Besides, you meet so many more cool people via trains/ buses/ boats/ cow.


Still have questions? Have an organization that you would like STP to teach at? Want to volunteer as an assistant? Then YOU RAWK! 


Head over to the FAQ on the website for more info:  http://www.strangetinypeople.com/faq/

Perks:

Let's talk about the cool schwag you get. 

Choose from these 4 images:

Too strapped for cash/cheap for these top levels? No problem, take a collection with your friends so you can all reap the rewards. Scalp tickets and make some bonus profit. I don't care. I want to help you, use me.

If The Goal Isn't Met..

OK, so this project is happening, one way or another. I've already been in contact with dozens of charities, low-income schools, and orphanage over many countries. We're going forward. Kids are gonna get awesome(r). 

I'll juggle irritated badgers on the street for cash if I have to.

The difference your funding makes is how long it goes on. With only my personal money, it won't last long, and there are a lot of kids who will miss out on a lot of opportunities. It's also possible that this book will never make it into anyone's hands, and these guys' stories will never be heard. 


Other Ways You Can Help

"But Josh, I have no monies!", you might be saying. 

First: Yes you do. Look, right there to your right, a nickel! (if not, keep looking. It's gotta be there). Point being, everyone has some cash they don't think they have, and every little bit helps. Donate whatever you can. Skip the Arby's drive-through once this week to make up for it. You'll be skinnier and you helped change kids lives. BAZZAM! Double-Karma-Kung-Fu-Madness.

Second: If you still feel like that Arby's is more important than a starving child's future (ok ok, those Jamocha shakes really are off the chain), then there is still a way you can help: SHARE THIS THING LIKE MONO.

  • Use your social might! Tweet, like the Facebook, spread the Google+, or write a blog post!
  • Earn a FREE copy of the book by spreading the word! (more on the contest soon)

  • Have a blog about children or photography? Own a news outlet? Work for a radio station? Have a community mahjong group?? Willing to bug your kids' elementary class??? Contact me at josh@strangetinypeople.com . I'd love to be a guest! And of course, all publicity is equally reciprocated on my page. 

Finally,

With all tongue-in-cheek and humour aside. I thank you.

I want to see this happen more than anything I have ever done in my life. You get very few precious times in your life where you feel like "this is absolutely what I'm supposed to be doing". Every bit you do to help this happen is a drop of hope for me and everyone I can help due to you. 


You are more important to more people than you will ever know.


~Josh.




中文:

人奇怪，孩奇丽.


大家好，我是Josh。 我是老师也是摄影师（jbeardfoto.com）。我的作品在美国及亚洲发表，而且我所教的创造力训练课程，课程对象为各年龄段从幼儿到成人的专业人士。我也是一个马里奥电子游戏功夫大师。:D

这是我的创意座位。 ;~) 


我有一张博客叫 Strange Tiny People, 是关于孩子可以相当的朋克，还值得我们更多的尊敬。如果你觉得孩子的东西很没意思，也许我们就应该重新考虑我们给他们的东西。孩子们应当有更好质量的教育，而不是我们去假设他们需要什么。我们要帮助他们开发他们心里的本来就有的想法和创造力。

 

安琪觉得你的《ABC‘s》被严重缺乏金属甩头。


这就是为什么我开展 Strange Tiny People 项目。我将旅行到很多亚洲地方给贫困儿童教创意和讲故事的方法。然后，这些孩子们将用他们自己的故事来帮助我建立一本书。他们的故事将伴随摄影插图。我将使用孩子本身为拍摄主角。孩子们将继续他们的作品的全部版权和信贷。这是他们第一次出版“违规记录”，而且希望成为许多在未来！


有一些故事是短的和开心的，就像这样：


有一些拥有强大地缘政治消息,就像这样：


还有一些真的很可怕，就像这样：
 （Strange Tiny People 提倡各种形式的创意，并认为审查使创造力窒息。）



为什么亚洲？

事实上这个项目旨在为所有儿童，每一种文化，每一种经济阶级，每一种饼干偏好。亚洲是目前对我最可用的。

从我多年在中国的教育体系，我所看到的，不幸的是，亚洲的教育常常忽略了创造性和探索性的学习方法以代替生产更高的测试分数和均匀性. 虽然传统和凝聚力的文化当然很重要，教育不重视自己的个性，以符合严格的标准，经常引起人们遵循，而不是想出办法来产生结果的订单。我想表明，通过创造性思维，追随者成为领导者，并为他们的社会产生更多的创造力。

Strange Tiny People是为了能够访问所有的孩子，我打算最终会参观尽可能多的可能的地点和分布尽可能多的真棒的想法。

这是我们的旅程的第一站，小子！


你在帮助穷孩子们当饥饿艺术家?...

创意不只是艺术表现能力。人具有较强的创造性思维能找到不同的方法来解决问题，社交和同情他人，并更细心常常被忽视的机会。

从发明下一个超酷的小工具，成为一个真棒画家，竞选政治职位，或者只做城里最好的炒饭, 创意常常是区别仅仅精通一门技能，并成为大师吧。

创意思维就像一块肌肉，固化的思维方式会让大脑很多创意的部分得不到更多的训练. 跟运动员一样，如果他好好锻炼，他的肌肉会一直准备好了能用，因为他的肌肉训练好了，就是自动的。跑步，抬重的东西，打斗， 这样的很容易。所以我的课不是教孩子什么想法很创意什么不创意，我的课就教他们怎么把他们的脑子给锻炼。

这个课程会帮助孩子们开阔他们的思路，用更多的视角和方式看世界，训练他们平常可能不注意的创意思维。Jobs , Picasso , 沈括 ,  左小祖咒 ,  艾未未 , Tessla , Chopin ,  姜文 .  那些是已经投入时间训练他们的大脑创造性地工作的家伙。 

现在想象一下，这些家伙小时候有受过这个训练的话。我希望人类的下一代是这样的人。


还有问题吗？你想STP任教于你的组织？希望志愿担任助理？那么你是真牛！

到网站上的常见问题解答的详细信息：http://www.strangetinypeople.com/faq/

如果目标是不符合.. 

是这样的，这个项目会发生，这样或那样。我已经接触过很多慈善机构，低收入的学校，孤儿院在许多国家。我们正在前进。孩子会变得更棒。

您的资助措施将决定这个项目进展多长时间。只有我个人的钱，也不会持续很长时间，会有很多孩子错过很多机会。这也有可能这本书将永远不会被公布，孩子们的故事将永远不会被听到。


其他的方法可以帮助

“但Josh，我没有金钱！”，你可能会说。

第一个事：错了，你有。你看，在那儿你身边，一块钱！（没有？请继续寻找）。关键是，每个人都有一些他们不认为他们有的现金，每一点是很有帮助的。捐赠任何你能负担得起。跳过麦当劳的这个星期一次。你会减肥，而你帮助改变孩子们的生活。哇！双赢！

第二个事：如果你还觉得麦当劳比一个饥饿的孩子的未来更重要（好好，那奶昔真的美味的），还有一种方法可以帮助：分享此活动！

•  用社交网络！人人，QQ，微博，微信， Facebook, Twitter, or write a blog post!

•  通过传播这个词赚取免费的书！（更多信息的较量即将推出）

•  有博客吗？拥有一个新闻媒体？在广播电台工作吗？有一个社区麻将组？愿意惹恼你的孩子的小学班？？？联系我josh@strangetinypeople.com。我很想做客！当然，所有的宣传是同样回报在我的网页上。


终于,

与所有的幽默预留。我感谢你。


我希望这个项目的发生比任何我生命中的事都重要，你曾经也说不定经历过这种感觉。任何一点你的帮助都是实现我梦想的基石，每一个我可能帮助的小孩也都归功于你。


你比你所知道的更重要。

~Josh
