story:
Au fin fond des Territoires du Nord-Ouest, dans une capitale isolée du reste du monde, à 500km du cercle polaire, vit une communauté d'irréductibles ténois! Ensemble, ils resistent à l'assimilation et vont vivre la langue française au travers de domaines aussi variés que les arts, la culture, l'économie, la santé, l'éducation ou encore tout simplement le quotidien...

L’Association franco-culturelle de Yellowknife (AFCY), le Conseil de développement économique des Territoires du Nord-Ouest (CDÉTNO) et la Fédération franco-ténoise (FFT) sont fiers de vous informer que l’émission La Petite séduction tournera un de ses épisodes à Yellowknife du 13 au 15 juin prochain.

Les trois organismes francophones sont heureux de joindre leurs forces pour organiser ce projet rassembleur qui s’adresse à la population de Yellowknife toute entière. Ce projet vise à faire connaître la capitale et la population francophone, ainsi qu’à offrir à la communauté l’occasion d’organiser un événement médiatique et festif de première importance. Yellowknife a le privilège d’être la première ville du Nord à être choisie pour accueillir la populaire émission de télévision La Petite séduction.

Selon l’équipe responsable de l’événement, l’engouement pour le Nord est palpable au sein de l’équipe de l’émission et nous croyons que la visibilité qui peut être donnée à la francophonie ténoise permettra de sensibiliser les francophones du Canada aux réalités des Territoires du Nord-Ouest.
Par toutatis, voici une vitrine incroyable pour la francophonie canadienne, en milieu minoritaire, hors Québec!

Le tournage coûte énormément d'argent , et notre communauté doit s'acquitter de couvrir une partie des frais d'hébergement, de transport, d'espace de travail... Sans oublier le financement de tout le côté divertissement, activités de séduction pour notre artiste invitée.

Vos contributions sont donc importantes dans l'aboutissement de ce projet et elles nous permettront de couvrir les dépenses nécessaires à notre opération séduction. Un grand merci pour votre participation. N’hésitez pas à passer le mot et faire de la publicité pour notre projet communautaire, en le partageant autour de vous.

story:
Short Summary

Leave your mark in history by contributing to a book written by you and many, while helping others.



Hey World,

My name is Avery Hill, a college student attending Bryant University in RI.  My major is Economic Public Policy with a concentration in Analytics and a minor in Entrepreneurship. My passion is community activism and helping others.  I have always loved service and finding ways to reach out and help others.  Ever since I joined a group called the Community Activism and Leadership Organization (CALO) I have been working to plan creative social good projects, such as "Written  By the World".

"Written By The World" is a project to bring the world together for a common goal.  The people of our world have many differences; religion, political stance, income level, and so much more... but what if we could bring thousands, if not millions together to write a book.  Imagine how great of a book could be written by everyone! We all have stories to tell, creative minds, passions, and many other things worth writing about, but most of us will not take the time or may not have the resources to write a book. This is the worlds chance to leave their mark. A crowd sourced novel of adventure, history, romance, comedy, horror, love, and what ever else can be dreamed up and written by the minds of our world.  You can follow a story line, start a new chapter, or just add a short story related to your life. This is the beauty of the project, it is open for your own interpretation.

The money raised by this campaign will be used to create a website online where anyone can read what has been already written and add their own chapter, page, paragraph, sentence, or word to the book.  All submitted content will be automatically posted as a page to the e-book online.

Excess funding plus all of the money made from the publication and selling of the novel will be used to start a scholarship for students studying journalism, used to help non-profit media companies grow, and for our celebratory signing get together.

This project has also been submitted to the Guinness Book of World Records, as we will attempt to write the book with the most contributing authors.

The project will last until the winter holiday season, but the fundraising is only going to last 10 days so lets see if we can make history in such a short period of time.

You can print and hand this flier out to friends!

WRITING PIECE QUALIFICATIONS:
-Must be a fictional piece of writing.
-Must be unpublished previously.
-Must be at least 3,000 words.
-Each author will receive their own chapter.

BUSINESS SPONSORSHIP:
-If you choose to donate $100 or more you can post a creative writing piece and add your logo to our sponsorship pages in the book.

What We Need 

Truthfully this project only needs to raise $12 that would be used to start the website hosting the book, but Indiegogo has a minimum fundraising amount of $500, so excess funds not used on the website will go towards the scholarship and non profit media companies. Every cent will go towards this project and these good causes.

The Impact

Your contribution will impacts the lives of ...
-thousands of students in the future who receive scholarships from the scholarship fund we create,
-all of those that find joy in the creation of this project,
-and allow for the entertainment of all those that enjoy the reading of the book.

Risks & Challenges

The main challenge will be spreading the idea of this campaign and getting the world to contribute to this project.  With your help we can make this happen!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in the place to donate monetarily we would love to have you contribute to the book. I asked CALO, the group I am a part of if we could create a page to sign-up to receive updates on the project and they were enthusiastic to help. So the site http://caloctw.com/written-by-the-world.html will have a sign up page and we will notify you when the writing of the book begins so you can contribute!

One last thing...
We want to keep this book clean, leaving out sex, racist references, and whatever else may make this book not "family friendly". So I do leave myself the right to take out inappropriate material from the book.

P.S. If someone wants to volunteer to graphic design a better logo for the campaign I am happy to accept.
P.S.S. We are gaining attention fast and may have to have more than one book or a series of books if we reach the thousand page cap too quickly and that is certainly a possibility so keep spreading the word and if we have more content we will have more books. It is all about helping others so we will do all we can to help as many people as we can.

Short Summary

Mi querida estrella de seis meses está diagnosticada con plagiocefalia. 

What We Need & What You Get

Por el momento a la bebe ya se le hicieron todas las evaluaciones,  pediatra, radiologo, fisiatra y un especialista ortopédico han hecho distintos estudios,  y se exhortó el seguir un tratamiento intensivo que incluye la fabricación de un casco a la medida (cranial remodeling helmet). El tratamiento es costoso y no lo cubre el seguro.

En estos momentos he estado concentrando esfuerzos para lograr reunir el dinero con la ayuda de la familia amistades y peticiones a algunas fundaciones. Estamos hablando que el costo de tratamiento y equipo oscila ente los  $3800 y $3500 dlls.  

El 30 de mayo, la familia paterna (abuela Zory) y materna (abuelos Raul y Adriana) de  ayudaron a pagar $1000 dlls. de anticipo para hacer el molde del casco.  Ese mismo día la Fundación Especial de Recursos Pro Niños (FERNI) autorizó la donación de $1000 dlls. que ayudarán a saldar parte de la deuda contraida del equipo. Y estamos esperando la respuesta de otras instituciones asi como la generosidad de otras personas.

¡La estrella necesita tú ayuda! Esta campaña virtual tiene como meta juntar 500 dlls. Si tienes los medios económicos y deseas hacer un donativo para el tratamiento y el casco,  agradeceremos infinitamente deposites a la cuanta de ahorro de SOFIA E. DIAZ GUTIERREZ en el banco 1FIRSTBANK de PR.


# de cuenta 1340010089
# de ruta es el 221571473

Finalmente, la poeta y escritora Yarisa Colón ha fabricado una serie de libretas  como simbolo de agradecimiento para aquellos que donen mas de $30 dlls a la condición de Sofía Esther. Así mismo, el artista plástico Justo Cabreras  y  el fotografo y escultor Josúe Guarionex  han donado a la causa tres de sus maravillosas piezas para quienes donen una cantidad igual o mayor de $150 dlls.   

PS. En caso de que hubiera un sobrante,  después de cubrir los gastos de Sofía Esther el dinero sobrante sería donado o devuelto a alguna de las instituciones colaboradoras para que ayuden a otro niño o niña de la misma condición que así lo requiera.

¡Muchas Gracias! tengo confianza en Dios y que El proveera las herramientas y medios que ayuden a salir adelante a mi hija.

story:
Summary Of The Four Part Series

The legend of Camelot, we’ve all heard of the story. King Arthur is the most loved King of all time and meets the love of his life, Guinevere. They fall madly in love and for time, their marriage and the Kingdom rein victorious over all else. Enter Lancelot, the most valiant and noble of all Knights the world has known. Forbidden love ensues and the world that Arthur has worked his entire life for is thrown into turmoil and anarchy. It is probably the most famous love triangle of all time. 

Now what would happen if we threw a twist in the story… say Guinevere and Lancelot are not from the 5th century, but from modern day America? Reflections Of The Legend delves deep into the story, adding a modern day twist to the romance. 

Genny and Lance are young and in love. Can they overcome the obstacles of romance, true love, primal urges, betrayal, death and a time portal? Follow their story that weaves them in and out of the story that has been written since the dawn of time; or has it. Did the legend really happen the way history has told us, or have we all been deceived? 

The Passion Of A New Day introduces us to the story from the beginning, where the deceit starts. Learn how all of our favorite characters and stories actually happened and how a little girl’s smile and heart begin to unravel the truth of history, revealing it is only a Reflection Of The Legend itself.

Who and Why

Who am I? That is the hardest question anyone can ask, at least of me. I mean, how do you tell a story that is still being written? Who I am is so much more than can explained in a short little paragraph. Titles can be given, Teacher, Doctor, Lawyer, Actor, Producer… We all have titles that make up who we are and what we do. I think the one thing that I am above anything else, deep down inside, is a dreamer.

For the last 18 years I have been defined as mom, mommy, and the always lovely to hear from a teenager, (Insert eye roll and attitude here), Mother. I have two of the most wonderful and lovely girls on the face of the planet. I have lived for them and no one else since they were a glimmer in my eye. Everything I have done has been for them. Now, I love being a mom, please don’t think I don’t love it, cause I do. It’s the best dream I could have ever fulfilled, but it’s the only dream I have fulfilled. I’m a dreamer. I want more.

We have all had dreams. When we’re young, we have the entire world at our fingertips and our limitations seem inconsequential. We have the time to do everything and anything we want to. Then we get older and sometimes our dreams become harder to see at times or are replaced by other dreams we may not have known we had or knew we wanted. We grow older still and our lives evolve into new ideas and our limitations tend to grow. Dreams are replaced by reality and our selflessness pushes our dreams to the background, we give ourselves to others and focus less on the dreams that used to be so clear. Before you know it, life has moved on and those dreams are a distant memory, knocking at that door in the back of your brain, asking if it can come out to play.

From as far back as I can remember, I had instilled in me that I can be and do anything that I wanted to, so long as I work hard for it. That is what I have tried to give to my girls as well, I just hope that they find their dream and are able to fulfill it long before I have. So now I suppose I must show them by example. I have to live up to what I am trying to teach them and finish what I have started.

I began writing Reflections Of The Legend almost 3 years ago. I wrote little bits and pieces here and there whenever I had time. I have always loved the legend of King Arthur and Camelot for as long as I could remember and writing a story that weaved itself in and out of that story was fun and even relaxing at times after a hard day. It was a release, a way to vent. You see I’m a dreamer so it was fun to dream and forget the ugliness that life can throw at you sometimes. About a year a half ago, life threw a curve ball at me. Without going into detail, I will tell you that it has been life altering. The fear of loosing a loved one is… scary for lack of a better term. Reality tore apart my view of life. It was no longer unending and limitless, there are limits, time limits.

It finally hit me that I didn’t have all the time in the world to tinker with my dreams. I needed to finally fulfill this lifetime goal I have had since the first time I typed on an antiquated computer when I was 6 and wrote a two-paragraph story about a puppy. So I finally buckled down and faced my dream, nightmares at times, and finished writing my first manuscript. I thought that writing the 700+ pages (almost 800) was the achievement of a lifetime, and it was. I have never been more proud of myself. I haven’t felt that in a long time. But as much as I am proud of myself, I need to take the next step and complete that dream of becoming a published author. I think this is the scariest thing I have done in my life.

I love books. They are a treasure worth more than any monetary value. Stories, poems, music, even movies, they all help us through our day and make life worth the effort. Who hasn’t curled up on a rainy day with a good book and felt the highs and lows of their beloved characters. I want to give that to the world, but I need your help.

They say honesty is the best policy so here goes. Basically I need money to finish the final editing and processing of my manuscripts for distribution. It’s plain and simple right? That’s what I thought but I was sadly mistaken. It’s been a lot harder than I ever would have thought.

We’ve all had hopes and dreams to do things beyond our own limited means and aspirations. I need help. I’d like to pose a question to you all. How many of you can honestly say that you are able to live out your dream on a daily basis? Okay, now for that handful of you that mentally raised your hands, how many of you did that on your own, with absolutely no help from anyone else? I have a feeling most of those hands went down. I am asking you to help this dreamer fulfill her ultimate dream. I can’t do it without you.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding goal is set at $5000. Yes, I was shocked too when I researched how much it would cost to hire a professional editor. I love my books and I want you all too as well. A professional editor is just as important to the success of my story as, well, the story itself. All contributions will go towards the cost of a professional editor, processing fees and marketing of the series Reflections Of The Legend by CreateSpace, an affiliate of Amazon.com. It will also cover shipping costs of the perks offered with your donations.

Okay, they tell me I should tell you where the funds will go if I don’t reach my goal. That’s so negative, I hate to think that I won't reach my goal. However, all funds, whether my goal is reached or not will go towards the publishing of this book and NOWHERE else. I am determinded to have this series published.

Please take a look at all the perks to the right.

I’m sure there is something there that tickles your fancy. Ever want to be immortalized in a book. There are perks for that, from being listed in the Acknowledgements or even dedicate my book to you and a lucky few. There are autographed posters and autographed copies of the first installment of the series, The Passion Of A New Day. There are perks where you can vote on what the actual book cover will be. Or if you are inclined you have the opportunity of becoming part of the story by having a character named after you in the fourth and final book of the series and even help decide how the series will end.

The Impact You Will Have

I think I pretty much covered this in the first section. Your contributions will help  my, long awaited, dreams come true. You'll create my happily ever after. The world will never tire of new stories to be told. Please help add this one to the ever-expanding universe.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute and that is TOTALLY okay and understandable, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help.

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE, help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. Indiegogo has wonderful share tools! Please Tweet, Facebook, E-mail or just tell people about this.

For any and all information and updates please visit the Facebook page at: https://www.facebook.com/ReflectionsOfTheLegend?ref=hl

One last thing… THANK YOU for taking the time to review my campaign. It means the world to me.

story:
It's simple

Studio time is very expensive, as is employing an engineer to oversee and edit the recording. Then there is the packaging and design of said packaging. 

All I'm doing here is asking you to pre-order the Audiobook which is on 2 CD's in an MP3 format, there is no risk to you. The production of the audio book is not dependent upon the success of this campaign. I did this with my third book you may remember, you pre-order, I get some money towards the production costs and you receive a signed copy for less then the retail price. 

However there are other bonuses to be had. I have put together a few packages, combinations of various other products in my line, books, t-shirts and the pannier replica box sets. All to help me meet my target and to offer my contributors something special, unique and personal.

story:
I'm an intuitive writer. By intuitive I mean that I'm not planning my stories. They come to me in the form of images. It's like having a film being played up from my inner eye. I follow the unfoldning with great excitement. Not even I, the author, knows how the story will end. It feels as if they are given to me. As if someone wanted me to tell these stories. The Bear Woman and two other stories came to me very suddenly and quickly some years ago. It's making them into physical books that is taking time. Firstly I write in Swedish which is my mother tongue. I tried publishers in Sweden with little success. I then decided to self publish as I could see all the advantages. It would give me the freedom to choose an illustrator and I wouldn't be forced to make any changes against my will. I decided to translate one of the stories to reach more readers and it also made sense as I live in the UK. I believed in the stories from the moment I had written them down and I knew I had to find the right illustrator. Now 4 years later I'm glad I had the patience. I have found a publisher that believes in both The Bear Woman and the illustrator. I think and hope The Bear Woman is a story that will appeal to many ages. It's something universal and mythical about it and I know the illustrator Dorrie Joy will bring my story to life with her magical paintings (www.dorriejoy.co.uk).

The Bear Woman is a story about love. A powerful, dramatic and adventurous narrative of Rion and Loana's possible and impossible love. It is a story that inspires us to never lose hope and to never let go of our dreams, regardless of how inconceivable they may seem. Bear Woman can be read by children from seven years of age and upwards, but is also a tale for grown-ups who have long since lost touch of their enigmatic, dreamy and magical childhood world.

Dorrie Joy will begin painting for The Bear Woman in May. The only thing that remains is funding for the printing and publication costs. So the only risk as I see it is that you wont be able to enjoy this mesmerizing story with illustrations :)

story:
The OmniWitch Magazine

Hello! My name is Riley Bee and I am creating The OmniWitch, a magazine made by witches, for witches.

I have been practicing Witchcraft for about 6 years now, and thought it would be great if we could get all kinds of witches together, helping to guide each other down their paths. I also wanted the witches to be a diverse team, offering opinions from all kinds of paths.

It started out as just an errant thought which so many witches seemed to like. The support of everyone I mentioned it to moved me and I realised that this was something that should happen. And here we are! I've researched the kind of content everyone wanted to see and have put together a team of diverse witches to help create this. Now we just need the money and support to bring this creation to paper.

We have an amazing team of diverse and talented witches and spiritualists who will be creating amazing content every month for you all.

What We Need & What You Get

We need this money to actually print the first issue of The OmniWitch. The absolute minimum we need is $300, this will cover all of our printing costs for the first issue. Hopefully we can collect more than that to ensure that we can continue past the first issue.

Everyone in the magazine (including myself) is working on an entirely voluntary basis.

In return for your money we have a raft of different options for every pocket. Ranging from a one off copy of the magazine (physical or digital) up to a full 12 month subscription which includes both the physical and the digital version.

On top of that, we have free gifts on offer, and also a competition which is run every month. The winner receives the original artwork of that months featured artist, with 5 runners up that will receive signed prints.

If we do not make the minimum $300 then we will only be able to offer digital copies until we can make enough to print.

So please contribute what you can, and share this fundraiser!

For news and updates you can follow us on Tumblr, Twitter, Facebook and Instagram. All under The OmniWitch.

story:
Short Summary

Hitchhiking GT is about translating and publishing the story of a spirited, funny, downright frank, naive, a bit crazy, innocent but decent and also rather courageous Transylvanian student (he likes being called "Timo") who was as poor as a church mouse, but wanted to travel the world.

For this young man, travel was not a matter of money, but a matter of courage, so he took the 70 Euros he had in his pocket and headed from Transylvania towards Mongolia and Vladivostok (the far, far extremity of Siberia). This is how the story started. Three years later, he had travelled in 78 different countries, counting 222.140 km done exclusively by hitchhiking. He's gathered 1.325 pages of an adventurous travel journal that includes amazing stories from stunning places or about extraordinary human beings.

One day, he thought: "How about putting all those pages of incredible adventures and encounters in a book?". The task is not as easy as it may seem, though. Thus, this crowd-funding campaign is meant to fundraise the minimum amount of money that is necessary to translate his first volume of the book (440 pages) in English and Spanish. But is it worthy, you may ask, to translate those stories and share them with the entire world? Let's have a pick at some of them and then you can decide for yourself:

When I was in Switzerland, I helped the police capture an extremely dangerous (wasted & drunk) driver:

In Siberia, my boots got ripped, so all I got left was the sandals below. And yes, that Russian Army truck took me hitchhiking. 

At the end of August, the temperatures dropped below zero, but someone offered me some Chinese sneakers.
In Afghanistan, on a very isolated country-side road, the guys who took me (as I was hitchhiking) introduced me to a taliban friend of them:

In Irak, I was taken by two policemen...not in custody, but for a ride, as I was hitchhiking Actually, the police took me hitchhiking 8 times; the ambulance (once on a motorcycle), 3 times, the gendarmerie, once and once I was taken by a helicopter:

Once by this vehicle:

Some highlights from his very long ride around the world:

* 300 km by night with a car without lights

* 400 km in a pick-up's back

*500 km through savana

*600 km through jungle

*7 000 km through deserts

*18 000 km through Siberia

* 3.350 km in 6 days with the same car

* 2.810 km in 5 days with same car

Here are some photos showing the pure and wild happiness of a child who never thought he would see the world:

Bottom left corner: Rio

Top right corner: Iguazu

Bottom right corner: Sahara

CENTRE: MACHU PICHU!

Below: jumping into a geyser (Bolivia):

Amazonia Rainforrest:

One of his love-affairs - The Little Mermaid: 

Siberia:

On my birthday (4 September 2013) near Krasnokamensk:

Russia, Kazan:

Kazahstan, Sharn Canyon:

Argentina, petrified wood:

Ushuaia:

Ecuador:

Portugal:


Iran, Isfahan:

Morroco:

Mongolia - with Gingis Han:

Here are some reviews Romanian readers did about Timo's writings on his blog: http://www.autostopmagellan.ro/recenzii-carte-inconjurul-lumii-cu-autostopul-timotei-rad/ 

What Timo Needs

After he reserched for 6 months all relevant travel literature of the last 140 years, what he needs now is a professional Romanian translator will charge about 3.000 – 3.500 USD for the 440 pages of the first volume. This is the minimim amount needed for this project. If the campaign will exceed the 7.000 USD initial budget, the money will be used to hire a professional editor and a publishing agent. If, after all this, there will be any money left, Timo will get back on the road. He's one bucket list wish is that he dies hitchhiking :)

What You Get

Great perks :)

Timo is selling travel atlases and book collections he acquired hardly during his academical years, from his 200 euros/month salary. He is also selling his most valuable books (a 1887 English Bible and a 1846 French New Testament) and stones he had collected during his rides.

A) Foreign Policy Romania - 14 Volumes (July 2008 - October 2011) - 30 USD:

B) Semi-precious stones from my roads - 30 USD:

C) Prehistoric Saharian Spearhead - 50 USD - (An anthropologist took me hitchhiking in Sahara and he offered me some of the artefacts he found in the sands of the desert):

D) Prehistoric Saharian Arrowhead - 100 USD - (An anthropologist took me hitchhiking in Sahara and he offered me some of the artefacts he found in the sands of the desert):

E) Prehistoric Human Otolith - 100 USD - (An anthropologist took me hitchhiking in Sahara and he offered me some of the artefacts he found in the sands of the desert):

F) Atlas - 7 Volumes - 50 USD:

H) Civilizații/Civilizations - 7 Volumes - 50 USD:

I) Jules Verne - 30 Volumes - 100 USD:

J) National Geographic Romania (mai 2003 - october 2012) - 500 USD:

L) Atlas DeAgostini - 9 volume, 4 000 pagini - 500 USD:

Re-copertate foarte profesional.

M) 100 personalități care au influențat istoria omenirii/100 personalities which changed history - 200 USD:

N) An very, very old English Bible (1887) - 500 USD:

O) An very, very old New Testament (1846) - 500 USD:

P) Great Painters (14 Volumes) and Museums (7 Volumes) - 100 USD


The Impact

In his home country, Romania, Timo's story was presented by important national TV stations (TVR 1, TVR 2, Antena 1, PRO TV, Realitatea), important national newspapers (Adevarul, Jurnalul National, Gazeta Sporturilor, Click) and also by online publications. The mainstream media usually presented his story as the unusual way of life of a weird loafer. Truth is he never had a marketing specialist or a public relations team to support him, so he did everything by himself. 

He also had two interviews abroad:

1) In Spain (as he is one of the craziest FC Barcelona fans you will ever meet!):

http://www.sport.es/es/noticias/barca/recorre-mundo-autostop-con-una-bufanda-del-barca-3638966

2) Norway:

http://www.nrk.no/troms/har-haiket-156.000-kilometer-1.11777882

Martin, a guy who took him hitchhiking on the road, presented him to a journalist who wrote the article; afterwards, Martin offered him a lift on his old viking boat, too).


Risks & Challenges

There are no guarantees that the book will become an international best seller... :) Ok, that's not the main risk. Even if we do not get the entire amount of money neccessary for translating and publishing the book, we will try to translate and publish it with less money – maybe we'll find some kind-hearted translators and editors who will help Timo even if the payment will not be so great for them.

The greatest challenge is, nevertheless, to turn this amazing solo adventure of his into something worth reading by thousands, as the adventures of Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn, for instance, that have inspired generations. The message Timo wishes to send to the world is that life is beautiful (la vita e bella!) and travelling, even with little money, can teach everyone some valuable lessons about humanity.

Other Ways You Can Help

First of all, you can make donations and aquire perks. You can also help by sharing this on Facebook, Twitter, Google, everywhere! Send the link of this campaign to anyone you know! To all your Facebook friends, to your e-mail contacts! One may never know where help can come from! Write about it on your blog, send it to your journalists friends, write to TV shows, to bloggers and vloggers you follow! Let's make this an international story, because it is a real life story that can inspire so many other people.

STALK YOUR DREAMS!!!

---

Video by: http://www.dailyshot.eu

story:
"SOME Magazine emerges from an urge to fight monotony with an experimental approach to the magazine industry, thus we are constantly aiming for alternative options to delight our readers."

Do you want SOME?

My name is Joshua Cabezas.  Founder of SOME Magazine and Some Publishing Group, both based in Puerto Rico.  I'm a visual artist, independent publisher and magazine aficionado.

Back in 2009, I found myself in a place where many art school graduates have been at some point in their lives: "I got my college degree!  What's next?".  A visit to New York City and a lot of research on the publishing business topic gave me the answer.  I noticed that the magazine industry in Puerto Rico was missing something: an experimental fashion and art publication.  Being motivated (and kind of challenged) by this, I decided to give Puerto Rico the magazine it was lacking.  In March 2010, SOME Magazine was officially born.

SOME is an independent magazine devoted to fashion, art and design.  Published quarterly in digital format, SOME is a reference guide for personal style and is expected to inspire rather than dictate.  Its objective is to end monotony by being spontaneous.  For the past five years, 17 issues (#00-#16) have been published, featuring work from over 150 local and international artists and photographers, including established names and up-and-coming talent.  After becoming a well-recognized online publication on an international level, SOME is ready to take the next step and enter the print periodical world.

The purpose of this campaign is to raise the money necessary to make the print version of SOME Magazine a reality.  Since its beginnings, SOME was conceptualized to be more like a book and less like a "glossy" in terms of format and contents, therefore only a limited edition will be printed, making it a must-have collection piece.  We've been offered to stock the magazine overseas and visit a couple of international art book fairs this year.  With your help, it can all be possible!

SOME Magazine - Issue #17: "Viral"

We are living in a world ruled by social media and cyber-realities... swimming in a sea of selfies, hashtags and status updates.  This issue is all about the internet and its wonders.

You will find editorial stories by SOME familiar names like Corrado Dalco, Gelou Karoll, Joshua Cabezas, Marion Bracqué, Natali Do, and Sergey Rogov.  Monica Milla and Natasha Fava join our list of contributors for the first time.

We will be featuring artwork by Australian artist Jodee Knowles and an exclusive piece by illustration extraordinaire Chepita Ouyeah.  Since we are going to talk about computers and communications-related stuff, conceptual artist Aram Bartholl is a must-have in the issue.

SOME Perks

In order to reach the $10,000 goal, we are offering a variety of perks and sponsor packages.  Get limited edition copies of the magazine, t-shirts, artist prints or become one of our official sponsors!

The money we get from this campaign will cover the magazine's production and distribution costs (including, but not limited to pre-production, printing, shipping, storage), perks expenses and all the fees that come with crowd funding (Indiegogo, PayPal).

Why help SOME?

SOME is a pioneer publication in the Puerto Rico magazine scene.  For this reason, it is very appealing to contributors and readers alike.

We are an ever-growing and promising platform.  With five successful years of progress and evolution in the digital publishing field, we are now determined to take SOME to another level.

By expanding our product into the print market, we are not only increasing our national and international readership exponentially, but we are also giving the Puerto Rico fashion and art magazine industry a fresh and innovative option thanks to the coffee-table photo book format that will make SOME Magazine a timeless and collectable piece.

By printing SOME, we will be able to present the magazine at New York Fashion Week and the NY Art Book Fair in September and during Art Basel Miami in December.

The magazine will be stocked and available for purchase at exclusive magazine boutiques, concept stores and our website.

How can you help SOME?

If you can't contribute, you still can help!

Word-of-mouth is a powerful tool.  Spreading the word and telling others about the campaign is equally important and it can make the difference between successfully funding the project or falling short.

There are plenty of ways you can be helpful and they don't involve money.  You can use Indiegogo share tools and add our hashtag for the campaign (#somegoesviral) every time you post on social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram).

Together, we can make SOME go viral!

Risks & Challenges

We all know that new projects can be challenging, but I've been working on SOME for 5 years, making myself sure, that when the day to print comes, everything flows smoothly and risks are minimum to none at all.

Even though this would be our first printed issue, we've published 17 issues so far, proving that the magazine's time management and fulfillment are steady and strong.

There is always the possibility of facing unexpected obstacles, like printing/shipping delays or mother nature, for example.

 a powerful tool.  Spreading the word and telling others about the 
campaign is equally important and it can make the difference between 
successfully funding the project or falling short.There are plenty of 
ways you can be helpful and they don't involve money.  You can use 
Indiegogo share tools and add our hashtag for the campaign (#somegoesviral) every time you post on social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram).Together, we can make SOME go viral!
 Risks & Challenges  We all know 
that new projects can be challenging, but I've been working 
on SOME for 5 years, making myself sure, that when the day to print 
comes, everything flows smoothly and risks are minimum to none at
 all.Even though this would be our first printed issue, we've published 17 issues so far, proving that the magazine's time 
management and fulfillment are steady and strong.There is always the possibility of facing unexpected obstacles, like 
printing/shipping delays or mother nature, for example.

story:
*THE STORY SO FAR*

Hi folks,

I'm Miika Hannila, the founder of Creativia, a 30-year old Finnish I.T. professional and overall a pretty relaxed, jovial guy. In 2012, I had a dream - to offer every talented author I came across the chance get their work published globally, and most importantly, to be able to do full-time what they feel passionate about - writing stories. We had just self-published my brother's book, Fargoer, after receiving several rejection letters from local publishers. Fargoer ended up being a #1 Amazon bestseller in its own genre, so I guess that wasn't such a bad choice.

At the time of writing, Creativia has 115 published titles and we've come such a long way, but we need your help. This campaign is your chance to make our dream a reality, and get some nice perks while doing so!

*Why fund Creativia?*

The modern publishing business is facing massive changes, and with Creativia we are introducing a completely new way to approach the publishing of any kind of book. Unlike traditional publishers, we have our own, unique way of handling intellectual property. Our authors own their work and if they wish, they can claim it back to themselves. In other words, publishing with Creativia is risk-free and we are confident that we can deliver.

At Creativia, we want to be a key player in building the publishing world of the future. Our whole business is based on the concepts of openness, trust and community.

OPENNESS - There are no secrets. Creativia operates with complete transparency.

COMMUNITY - We work closely together with our authors, and consider every one a friend.

TRUST - Our authors trust us when it comes to making the best choices with marketing, sales and everything else not related to writing. In exchange, we trust our authors to bring their A-game when writing, delivering us stories that matter. Stories that will make people feel; ones that will have an effect.

*OK, so what's in it for me?*

We need your help to take the next step. All funds we receive will be used in full to help our authors get their word out there in the best possible way:

- Marketing and book promotions

- Editorial services

- Art and cover design

We have the recipe, but lack the ingredients. If you decide to supply us with some of those, you will also get a piece of the cake!

*What will happen if I contribute?*

You will not only receive one of our epic perks, but will also be helping two distinct parties: the authors and the readers.
The authors work hard every day to bring out new books for the readers. You will enable them to reach as many potential, interested readers as possible.
The readers will be able to enjoy our books better than ever, whether it's thanks to improved interior or cover art.


*Risks & Challenges*

The competition is stiff. Books do not just compete against each other for the valuable, limited time of the customers, but also against every other form of media, be it TV, YouTube, newspapers, music or 9gag. We have the tools, and we've done the research. We know how to prevail in this competition.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't fund us, we understand :) Even so, we would appreciate you telling a friend about us!

story:
Este proyecto largamente acariciado, parte un grupo de periodistas, historiadores e investigadores ansiosos por conocer la verdadera historia reciente de Uruguay, procesarla y difundirla, ya que consideramos un deber y un derecho de cada ciudadano del mundo conocer lo que realmente ocurrió antes, durante, y después del Proceso Cívico Militar desde sus mismas entrañas.

Nada mejor que las páginas de un libro para registrar la verdad y lograr que permanezca en el tiempo, pasando de generación en generación como una verdad irrefutable, arrancada de documentos reales y relatos de personas que fueron testigos y protagonistas de los hechos.

Obtener el aporte necesario para editar ese libro es parte de nuestra campaña, y tenerlo al fin en nuestras manos, para presentar al mundo el resultado de una ardua tarea informando a uruguayos y extranjeros de la "Verdadera Verdad", es nuestro objetivo.

This long-cherished project, part of a group of journalists, historians and researchers eager to know the true recent history of Uruguay, process and disseminate, as they consider it a duty and a right of every citizen of the world to know what really happened before, during, and after the Civil Military Process from its bowels.

Nothing like the pages of a book to record the truth and make it stay in time, passing from generation to generation as an irrefutable truth, torn from actual documents and accounts from people who witnessed the events and protagonists.

Get input required to edit this book is part of our campaign, and finally have it in our hands, to present to the world the result of hard work informing Uruguayans and foreigners of "Verdadera Verdad" is our goal.




Necesitamos reunir US$2.900 para imprimir la cantidad de 1.000 libros que sabemos resultarán pocos, pero por algo se comienza y ya tendremos tiempo de realizar una nueva campaña para una segunda edición, o si multiplicamos la cantidad fijada como meta, sin dudas, editaremos más de 1.000.

Detalles del libro

Formato:    17 x 24

Paginas:    208

Interior:    1 tinta sobre papel obra 80 grs. 32 pág. a 4 tintas en coteado brillo 115grs.

Tapa:    4 tintas sobre papel cartulina 245 grs. Laminado mate 

Encuadernación:  Cosido a hilo y tapa pegada

Estamos convencidos de que este proyecto no sólo es valioso para los uruguayos, sino también para el resto del mundo, porque a todos nos han vendido historias inciertas y han distorcionado y silenciado los hechos con premeditación por pura conveniencia política. Y para que esto ocurra es fundamental el apoyo y el aporte a esta campaña.


We need to raise US $ 2900 to print the amount of 1,000 books which we know will be few, but something started and we'll have time to make a new campaign for a second edition, or multiply the target number, no doubt, will edit more 1,000.

Details of the book

Format: 17 x 24

Pages: 208

Interior: 1 ink on paper 80 gsm work. 32 p. 4 gloss inks coteado 115grs.

Cover: 4 colors on cardboard 245 gr paper. matt laminate

Binding: Thread sewn and attached lid
We believe that this project is not only valuable for Uruguayans, but also for the world, because we've all been sold and have uncertain histories distorted and silenced the facts premeditated by pure political expediency. And for this to happen it is essential to support and contribution to this campaign.

Sabemos lo que arriesgamos, sabemos que ésto es un verdadero desafío, y que podemos no llegar a reunir lo que nos propusimos como meta, porque mucha gente teme a la verdad y se negará a colaborar.
Trataremos de contagiarles nuestro coraje y convencerlos de que cada pueblo debe tener su historia real y debe mostrarla al mundo sin temores... es la verdad la que nos hace libres.
Y en el peor de los casos, sino llegaramos a lograr el total de la meta, buscaremos la forma de conseguir editarlo con lo que recaudemos, así sea bajando la calidad del producto, desición poco recomendable, pero no se descarta.


Y si no puede colaborar, igual apoye compartiendo, difundiendo, generando eco en redes sociales, sitios web o simplemente por emails con los enlaces que se encuentran en los íconos de la página.
¡No quede callado, no se siente a mirar sólo porque no puede aportar, también se colabora contándole al mundo sobre este proyecto, comience ya!

Yo quiero que mis hijos, y los hijos de mis hijos sepan la "VERDADERA VERDAD" sobre la historia de su País... ¿y usted?

I want my children and my children's children know the "REAL TRUTH" about the history of his country ... and you?

Short Summary

Hi, I’m Gail Mae Ferguson-Maceda, I’m an EFT Practitioner in New York City. My other careers were as a ballerina, a performer on Broadway, a choreographer and teacher. My favorite job is as a Mom of five great kids! I am really passionate about EFT which stands for Emotional Freedom Techniques. EFT is an amazing new energy therapy that helps people be free of emotional trauma that keeps them either stuck in life or causes a lot of anxiety. Many of our problems go back to some kind of trauma (big or small) that keeps us from achieving many of our goals in life such as great relationships and financial success.  These traumas can also cause fears, phobias, pain and disease.

I wrote this book about John because I thought that if we could clear a lot of the bad stuff that happens in school or home right away when it happens, how much easier growing up would be. John’s story is the first in a series of books I am writing to help kids. Although John’s story is not a huge trauma, many little ones, like his experience in the book, can add up to an adult John being terrified to speak at a conference his boss has asked him to present at or prevent him from applying for a job he really wants.  Fear can stop us from doing a lot of the great things we would love to do in life. Think of how many Ghandis, Beethovens, Rosa Parks or Mother Teresas there are in the world who are maybe too afraid to speak up and be heard because they had so much unhealed trauma in their childhoods.  We all know there are some kids who have serious trauma, just imagine a world where their traumas are taken care of in an easy and gentle way.

I want to take my book and EFT to schools to share with kids, parents, teachers and counselors. EFT helps kids with test and performance anxiety, ADHD, allergies and all kinds of other problems. It helps the teacher calm the kids down so their minds are ready and open to learning. It helps them to have more caring and understanding relationships with their schoolmates.


What We Need & What You Get

I would like to raise $3,000 to pay my wonderful and amazing illustrator who made the video and who helped me with formatting my book, not to mention my grammar. Thank you Manoj!!. This amount will also cover copyright and publishing costs, for books to be given to schools and libraries, as well as to put up a website that kids, parents and teachers can go to to get more information about EFT, tapping scripts and other stories about tapping.


The Impact

EFT has made such a huge difference in the quality of my life. My mission is to spread the word to as many people as possible and help as many parents and kids as possible. Parenting is an awesome and difficult job. My mission and my passion is to help others to realize that they are:
 
a) not alone,
b) not going crazy,
c) normal,
d) not at fault, and,
e) worthy and deserving of love.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for contributing to my campaign. i love you and am grateful from the bottom of my heart. I want you to know that there may be a child, a parent or a teacher out there whose life could be changed for the better from reading my book and learning about EFT.  By contributing, you have done a really awesome and wonderful thing. You are helping to make the world a more beautiful place.
 
If you cannot contribute right now could you please pass this link on and share the campaign to those who may be able to help?
 
Whether you contribute or pass it on, again, I thank you from the bottom of my heart!
 
Any monies raised above the $3,000 will be put towards distributing more books and giving talks on EFT to schools and libraries.

story:
Short Summary

StoryFarm is a creative nonfiction cooperative for writers, thinkers, and other interesting animals. Based in San Francisco, StoryFarm celebrates the power of the written word. Through literary readings, writing salons, and workshops, as well as social events, StoryFarm’s goal is to provide an opportunity for people to engage with the creative nonfiction genre in a way that is currently not available in the Bay Area. 

Please consider contributing to our 1234 Seed Sowing Campaign to help us get StoryFarm off the ground!

What We Need & What You Get

We are hoping to raise $1,234 for our kickoff celebration on February 9, 2013. The event will feature readings from six published nonfiction authors, as well as a pre-show wine and cheese reception, and an after party, and will serve as a launching pad for our literary program.

Funding will be used to pay for venue rental, promotional materials, programs, refreshments, etc. If we don't reach our entire goal, we will have to pay for those expenses out of pocket.

We have a lot of great perks for donations starting at just $25.

The Impact

San Francisco’s literary scene is thriving, with a bountiful supply of talented writers, reading series, and writing organizations; however, there is no one association devoted specifically to creative nonfiction. StoryFarm is unique in that it provides creative nonfiction writers and enthusiasts a community where they can come together, cultivate relationships, and learn and grow in an exciting and collaborative way.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word! Tell your friends about StoryFarm. Direct them to our website and social networking pages. Use the Indiegogo share tools to let them know about our fundraising campaign. Word of mouth support is just as important and impactful as monetary donations.

story:
Campaign Summary

The money raised from this campaign will be used for different purposes. It will be used for financial support so that I can complete the novel, hiring a copyeditor and paying for promotional and marketing materials.

 

Book Summary

Ever the adventurer, young Edgar J. Hawthorne sets out on a journey to the Royal Observatory at the Cape of Good Hope, South Africa to investigate the Great Moon Hoax of 1835 after reading an article in the Edinburgh Journal of Science submitted by none other than close family friend John Herschel.

Travelling with the Royal Air Brigade on the Stratos, Her Majesty's newest and most advanced airship, Edgar and the crew are caught unaware in the early dawn by a group of marauders who force the Stratos down into the deep jungles of Africa with the aid of an on-board saboteur.

In search of provisions, once on the ground, Edgar and a portion of the crew stumble across an ancient ziggurat with a hidden entrance. Once inside Edgar discovers an ancient tale of prophecy written in hieroglyphs warning of an impending attack.

After many more trials and hardships Edgar and the crew, finally able to continue on their journey, arrive at the Cape of Good Hope behind schedule only to find disaster has befallen Herschel and the Royal Observatory.

Something is amiss and Edgar suspects there are other forces involved in the incident at the Observatory and with the help of Herschel's assistant Thomas Coleman, Edgar sets out to solve the mystery only to uncover a secret that could mean the end of all mankind.

 

My Situation

Originally I had planned to publish the Hawthorne series, and my other books, on my own. But circumstances have caused me to seek outside help.

Publishing a book is an expensive proposition, if it is to be done right. Covers need to be designed professionally, websites and other marketing channels need to be created, professional services for critiques, proofreading and copy-editing need to be secured, and promotional and marketing services and products need to be purchased.

There are other costs involved in writing and publishing a book but I won't list them all here. A lot goes into the publishing of a book besides hard work and time. Money is required also, which I have already invested much of my own, but now I need your assistance as well to make the BRASS HAND pentalogy a reality beginning with the first book HAWTHORNE: MYSTIRIO ASTRONOMIKI.

 

What's In It For You

Everyone who contributes will get their name and a special thanks in the acknowledgements of the book. Some, contributing $20.00 or more will get an autographed paperback and their name in the acknowledgements.

Those who desire to contribute at the higher levels will earn even greater premiums. And I'll be adding more as the campaing goes on. Take a look below for just two of the great items you could walk away with if you contribute today! 

 

Look...

 

Receive a signed paperback version of the book for pledges of $20 or more. 

 

Recieve this quality cotton HAWTHORNE T-Shirt for pledges of $50, $100 and $1,213!

 

Recieve this perk for a pledge of $1,213.00!

New Kindle Fire HD 8.9 with HAWTHORNE: MYSTIRIO ASTRONOMIKI pre-loaded!

 

Contact Information

If you have any questions that I haven't answered here (I'm sure there are many) please contact me personally at thehawthornebooks@gmail.com or cnlmeeker@verizon.net

I am also on facebook at facebook.com/christopher.meeker.54 , twitter at twitter.com/Chris_C_Meeker , and of course the Hawthorne website at

www.thehawthornebooks.com

Again, thank you for your consideration and please share the links above.

My Situation
Originally I had planned to publish the Hawthorne series, and my other books, on my own. But circumstances have caused me to seek outside help.
Publishing a book is an expensive proposition, if it is to be done right. Covers need to be designed professionally, websites and other marketing channels need to be created, professional services for critiques, proofreading and copy-editing need to be secured, and promotional and marketing services and products need to be purchased.
There are other costs involved in writing and publishing a book but I won't list them all here. A lot goes into the publishing of a book besides hard work and time. Money is required also, which I have already invested much of my own, but now I need your assistance as well to make the BRASS HAND pentalogy a reality beginning with the first book HAWTHORNE: MYSTIRIO ASTRONOMIKI.
 

What's In It For You
Everyone who contributes will get their name and a special thanks in the acknowledgements of the book. Some, contributing $20.00 or more will get an autographed paperback and their name in the acknowledgements.
Those who desire to contribute at the higher levels will earn even greater premiums. And I'll be adding more as the campaing goes on. Take a look below for just two of the great items you could walk away with if you contribute today! 
 

Look...
 
Receive a signed paperback version of the book for pledges of $20 or more. 

 
Recieve this quality cotton HAWTHORNE T-Shirt for pledges of $50, $100 and $1,213!

 
Recieve this perk for a pledge of $1,213.00!

New Kindle Fire HD 8.9 with HAWTHORNE: MYSTIRIO ASTRONOMIKI pre-loaded!
 

Contact Information
If you have any questions that I haven't answered here (I'm sure there are many) please contact me personally at thehawthornebooks@gmail.com or cnlmeeker@verizon.net
I am also on facebook at facebook.com/christopher.meeker.54 , twitter at twitter.com/Chris_C_Meeker , and of course the Hawthorne website at
www.thehawthornebooks.com
Again, thank you for your consideration and please share the links above.

story:
What is Filmic?

In September of 2014, a coalition was formed by movie-lovers at Ithaca College. Numbering a dozen members in its early days, we sought to establish an organization that would give all student cinephiles a place to share their thoughts and learn from each other about film - outside the sometimes restricting boundaries of the classroom.

Filmic primarily splits itself between two activities. The first is the magazine, which represents a wide diversity of topics in cinema. Old and new, blockbusters and indie darlings, "highbrow" and "lowbrow." We've covered everything from 80's horror schlock, the films of Kevin Smith and favorite moments from the Star Wars saga to obscure foreign cinema (e.g. Amer, Lilja 4-Ever & Wake in Fright), Lars von Trier and the 2015 Cannes Film Festival. Everything (both the issues and the individual, standalone articles) is posted to our website and the pieces cover about 13 sections including:
  • Reviews (Contemporary and Throwback)
  • Hidden Gems (Write-ups on lesser-known works)
  • Analyze This! (Thorough technical or thematic breakdowns of various movies)
  • Versus (Head-to-head match-ups of similar films)
  • Discourse (One on one debates/discussions on the merits of a film or filmmaker)
  • For the Love of Film (Personal narratives from our contributors on how they came to love the medium)
While our articles reach fellow IC students and movie fans beyond, our second activity is targeted at the immediate campus community. Each semester, we strive to put on a screening series representing the same diversity of topics that the magazine covers. Each film is followed by an informal discussion with the audience. Spring of 2015 marked our first one and we showed the following films:
  • The Night of the Hunter (Charles Laughton, 1955)
  • La Haine (Mathieu Kassovitz, 1995)
  • The Fly (David Cronenberg, 1986)
  • Koyaanisqatsi (Godfrey Reggio, 1982)
  • Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters (Paul Schrader, 1985)

Where is the money going?

  • 50% goes to the printing costs of the three issues we're aiming for in the Spring. In addition to going up online, we run physical copies, which are distributed around campus and the local art house cinemas.
  • 30% goes to securing the rights for the three films we plan on showing for the Spring screening series. Unlike professors showing movies for a course, we are not exempt from having to purchase public performance rights.
  • 10% goes to equipment needed for a podcast we are currently in the process of developing.
  • 7% goes to renewing our domain on Wordpress.
  • 3% goes to advertising costs for the screening series. We design our own posters for each film and print several copies to be posted around campus.

Why this matters

While based at a school that is celebrated for its film program, we encourage students from every academic department to join us because we believe in cinema's universal appeal and its ability to enrich and inspire, regardless of whether or not you mean to make a career out of it. There are many student-run publications throughout the country, but film-specific ones are rare and we intend to fill that void, fostering the cinephilic voice and passion of our readers and writers alike. 

Our membership currently stands at 94 strong, and we've produced 3 issues and nearly 100 articles to date. With your help, we hope to continue to provide an exciting platform for expression and informal education in the world of cinema!

If you resonate with what we strive to do and decide to contribute - either monetarily and/or by sharing this campaign - please know that we greatly appreciate your consideration!

Short Summary

Hello, and welcome to the world of †3Dark. If you're new to us, then we humbly bid you take a pew in our dark cathedral. If you're already an acolyte of our order, then we may merely exchange the secret handshake. 

†3Dark is a project that aims to publish radical fiction by both new and established voices. We value art over commercial appeal, deep understanding over zeitgeists. The stories here do not conform to standard publishing lengths and play with structure in compelling ways. Our work explores the bigger questions of reality: the spiritual, other worlds, who we are, what is our purpose, is there such a thing as good and evil, and if there is: is the dark side stronger? Our first issue was praised for the quality of its production and stories. We're very proud of that. Our second issue hopes to be even better, with incredible tales from Andy Cashmore, Anthony Self,  Christa Wojciechowski and Richard Thomas!  

Don't believe us? Well, check out this review of our first issue from the great Eden Royce, guru of Southern Gothic fiction and author of Spook Lights 1 & 2 :

“While this project had to change from its original concept of 13 individual stories, released separately, the final product is no less stunning. And it holds fast to its original promise of story theme: Light and dark. Sacred and profane. Comprised of short dark stories by three authors, each with an intro by editor Joseph Sale, †3 Dark also gives each tale searingly gorgeous artwork packaged with an eerie cover”  – Eden Royce

These stories will total some 41,000 words of fiction! 

Check out the cool cover for this issue below:

What We Need & What You Get

To explain our figure of £1,400... We will need a minimum of £315 to pay for print costs. In order to complete this issue, we will also need £800.00 to pay our artist Shawn Langley for concept artwork for each story. Each concept piece costs £200.00 and there will be 4 pieces in this issue. If you're unfamiliar with Shawn's incredible work, check out the incredible piece he did below for Samuel Parr's story "Undertow". 

 

What can you get with this IndieGoGo campaign? You can get: 

  • Our first and second issues, in digital and paperback editions
  • Original artwork from Shawn Langley
  • Horror and Dark Fantasy book bundles, with novels by Joseph Sale
  • A "Cathedral of the Deep" article written on a subject of your choosing
  • Your name immortalised forever in our tome!

What is the "Cathedral of the Deep"?

Joseph Sale is the author of the Cathedral of the Deep series, a blog about Gothic literature and movies, Horror and neo-noir, and how to tell stories in these genres. It is designed to be pragmatic as well as academic, with exercises and how-tos to get writers over the hurdles they face in their stories. So far, there have been three installations, released for free online, each one dealing with different topics: openings, themes, endings, structure and much more. 

The Impact

Your contribution not only gets our issue out into the world. It's more than making a digital thing physical.

  • You will also be supporting the careers of up-and-coming writing stars.
  • You will be fighting the publishing machine and the dearth of quality, imaginative fiction in our world by breathing life into something genuinely fresh. 

Promise

All profits (aka: money that is not used for printing & shipping) will go to the authors. 

Risks & Challenges

As this is our second run, we are very confident that we will be able to produce an issue of equal or even higher quality than the first. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We recognise times are tough and not everyone can contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help us! Please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Our Twitter handle is @project13dark & we also have a Facebook page.

story:
Our story 

Marhaba! We are Tim Bruns, Markus Maier, and Ben Korff.

  • We've spent much of the past 5 years in Palestine climbing, teaching and developing new climbing sites around the West Bank.
  • When we arrived in 2014, there were few Palestinian climbers and the only climbing sites in the West Bank were in Israeli-controlled areas.
  • We started by bolting climbing routes near the Palestinian village of Ein Qiniya and the development spread.... 
  • In 2016, Tim (author) and Will Harris opened Wadi Climbing, the first indoor climbing gym in Palestine. The local climbing community has grown from there. 
  • To date, we have bolted over 170 new sport climbing routes around the West Bank (with lots of help!) 
  • Today, Palestine is home to a vibrant climbing community and unique climbing sites in a bucolic, Levantine setting.
  • Its time to share this with the world! 

With this book we hope to encourage people to visit and climb in Palestine. We want to show that Palestine can be a fun, safe and captivating place to visit. We are also advocating for increased freedom of movement for Palestinians who live under Israeli military occupation. Finally, we hope our book humanizes this rich, complex and fascinating place and its people. Rock Climb Palestine!

Help us put Palestine on the international climbing map 

  • We need to raise $5000 to cover the initial publishing, editing and distribution costs.
  • Any money that we raise above our goal will be used to support more climbing development in Palestine (more climbing routes, gear for local climbers, new programs at Wadi Climbing gym etc.)
  • The content of the guidebook is 98% finished! 
  • After editing this spring, the book will be printed this summer and distributed in the fall. The book will be in stores and on Amazon by the end of 2019.

This book tells a different story

The story that the world hears about Palestine is myopic. With this book, we hope to share a unique experience of Palestine through the medium of rock climbing. This is not a black and white story. The injustice of Israeli military occupation exists alongside sunny afternoons at the crag. There are checkpoints and soldiers. There are also world-class climbing routes, delicious Palestinian meals, welcoming local climbers and beers after climbing at one of Ramallah's many bars. Climbing, and the freedom of movement it provides, has a special significance in this troubled context. 

Thanks to everyone who has helped develop climbing over the years! 

Esther Strunck (the guidebook designer!), Will Harris (co-founder of Wadi Climbing), Matthias Wurtenberger, Dario Franchetti, Georg Layr, Christelle Bakhache, Selim Schweizer, Anas Askar, Inas Radaydeh, Andrea Bernardi, Camille Dupuoy, Kim Van Der Putten, Marcin Pius, Wahid Masri, Tobias Mohn, Ishaq Rajabi, Philipp Zwehl, Ewa Gorska, David Jacob, Shadan Nassar, Bastien Schilling, Miranda Oakley, Tony Yao, Matt Harms, Tyler Myers, Gabe Sawant, Majdal Sobeh, Laila Zamora, Fedor Broekhoven, Jody Braggar, Michael Schreiber and many more! 

Please share our project! 

Even if you can't donate now, please share our project with friends and family. Find us on Instagram and Facebook @climbingpalestineguidebook

story:
In Short

Hello! My name is Isabelle Kenyon and I'm a freelance editor and publisher in the North of the UK. I'm passionate about poetry and believe that socially conscious work has the power to change opinion. I publish high quality anthologies on pressing issues, chapbooks and poetry products, from exceptional poets around the globe.

What I Need & What You Will Get!

The funds will be used for making Fly on the Wall Poetry a sustainable press - it will ensure that submissions are forever free, and that I can pay my contributors with both royalties and free books!  https://www.flyonthewallpoetry.co.uk  

The funds will be specifically used for the following:

  1. Artist fees for 2 chapbooks
  2. Website fees for this year.
  3.  Author copies and postage
  4. Marketing my press effectively via print, online and facebook advertising
  5.  Keeping the webzine and submissions going forward forever free!

You will be able to access the following, based on your lovely donations:

  • Arts Marketing consultancy including an hour Skype call and 3 month customised marketing plan. I specialise in books, but have great experience in press coverage and online marketing.
  • Manuscript editing and proofreading - for free! I edit both poetry and prose. 
  • Individual poem/short story feedback.
  • Free anthologies - Please Hear What I'm Not Saying or Persona Non Grata, delivered to your door.
  • Free chapbooks - I can currently offer my own work, Digging Holes To Another Continent, or This is not a Spectacle

The Impact

  • My anthologies are valuable worldwide for their power to change opinion and fundraise - I have raised over £548 for UK mental health charity, Mind so far with the press' first anthology, 'Please Hear What I'm Not Saying'. I believe words have the power to evoke change and your funding will allow me to make a difference.

  • Chapbooks will be launched next year, and with a large scale anthology being announced at the start of next year, your support will be greatly appreciated. It will mean I can continue to publish high quality books which respect the talent of the poets and artists who have contributed to them.

  • Any extra funds raised will be used to sustain the press for the future, and will mean I can commission poets and artists, ensuring they are paid for their high quality work! 

  • I started the press as a simple blog last year, and now I'm looking at making this a part time job!

Risks & Challenges

My press has focused on working with charities for these fantastic anthologies, which means that the profit margin for the press is next to none. The future will keep up this brilliant fundraising work, but focus on campaigning. 

  • Publishing chapbooks will ensure the press has a focus on individual talent, rather than solely revolving on charity work.
  • I am developing my editing and marketing services to ensure the press is sustainable!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Make some noise about this campaign online!
  • Send an email to people who may be interested?
  • Buy a book from the Fly on the Wall Website - or add it to your Xmas list! www.flyonthewallpoetry.co.uk

PREVIEW CHAPTERS!

Story of LGBTQ+ Revolution 2.0 by Jill Fredenburg

My name is Jill Fredenburg, and I am the author of LGBTQ+ Revolution 2.0!

*EDIT* The goal of 6,000 was decided upon before COVID-19 impacted the United States. Any funds raised over $4,000 will be donated to LGBTQ+ organizations' COVID-19 initiatives!

I wrote this book to celebrate LGBTQ+ stories and explore how identities can layer beautifully together. I was compelled to write this because I felt that, while there are so many wonderful guides to LGBTQ+ language and identity in general, I hadn’t seen a compilation of stories from queer folks. I didn’t have representation of pan and bisexuality growing up that wasn’t hugely sexualized - I barely have it now. This book attempts to do that - to bring spectrums of sexuality, gender, and romance together in one collection. 

In this book, you'll learn about the way we often talk about Bisexuality and Pansexuality, and how many people use "Queer" because the traditional definitions haven't worked quite right. You'll read conversations about how:

  • Asexuality is often left out of the conversation
  • It is still more difficult to be Out in certain parts of the USA 
  • Queer people in a "hetero-presenting" relationship are still Queer

You will love this book if you are passionate about the LGBTQ+ community and its progressive momentum.

LGBTQ+ Revolution 2.0 is a non-fiction book that speaks to Queer people and individuals who are looking at this huge, multifaceted community and its many layers for the first time.

 

LGBTQ+ Revolution 2.0


The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part 1 contains the introduction and information "How We Got Here - LGBTQ+ History, Stories of Activism, and How Celebrity and Media Impact the Community."

Part 2 details some of the issues we struggle with as a community. Coming Out is still a terrifying expectation regardless of who surrounds us. There is often a very cis and white presentation of who is an "acceptable" Gay person. And our obsession with vocabulary can sometimes send us into spirals of pain and confusion. Despite these problems, young Queer people are learning more every day and taking ownership of their identities. 

Part 3 shares narratives of wonder, exploration, empowerment, and love. From questions about stirring the pot when you could easily "pass," to layering Queer identity with religion, these stories capture the vivid nature of Queerness in 2020. 
 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July, 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

Story of LGBTQ+ Revolution 2.0 by Jill Fredenburg
My name is Jill Fredenburg, and I am the author of LGBTQ+ Revolution 2.0!
*EDIT* The goal of 6,000 was decided upon before COVID-19 impacted the United States. Any funds raised over $4,000 will be donated to LGBTQ+ organizations' COVID-19 initiatives!
I wrote this book to celebrate LGBTQ+ stories and explore how identities can layer beautifully together. I was compelled to write this because I felt that, while there are so many wonderful guides to LGBTQ+ language and identity in general, I hadn’t seen a compilation of stories from queer folks. I didn’t have representation of pan and bisexuality growing up that wasn’t hugely sexualized - I barely have it now. This book attempts to do that - to bring spectrums of sexuality, gender, and romance together in one collection. 
In this book, you'll learn about the way we often talk about Bisexuality and Pansexuality, and how many people use "Queer" because the traditional definitions haven't worked quite right. You'll read conversations about how:

Asexuality is often left out of the conversation
It is still more difficult to be Out in certain parts of the USA 
Queer people in a "hetero-presenting" relationship are still Queer

You will love this book if you are passionate about the LGBTQ+ community and its progressive momentum.
LGBTQ+ Revolution 2.0 is a non-fiction book that speaks to Queer people and individuals who are looking at this huge, multifaceted community and its many layers for the first time.
 
LGBTQ+ Revolution 2.0
The book is written in 3 Parts....Part 1 contains the introduction and information "How We Got Here - LGBTQ+ History, Stories of Activism, and How Celebrity and Media Impact the Community."Part 2 details some of the issues we struggle with as a community. Coming Out is still a terrifying expectation regardless of who surrounds us. There is often a very cis and white presentation of who is an "acceptable" Gay person. And our obsession with vocabulary can sometimes send us into spirals of pain and confusion. Despite these problems, young Queer people are learning more every day and taking ownership of their identities. Part 3 shares narratives of wonder, exploration, empowerment, and love. From questions about stirring the pot when you could easily "pass," to layering Queer identity with religion, these stories capture the vivid nature of Queerness in 2020.
